Underwater Camouflage.name: Underwater Camouflage
Underwater Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

Poisonous Flesh.name: Poisonous Flesh
Poisonous Flesh.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s poison infuses its flesh.

A creature that touches the ala or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.condition: A creature that touches the ala or hits it with a melee attack

Ascension.name: Ascension
Ascension.description:
When a friendly creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see and within its [[/item Aura of Valor]] is reduced to 0 hp while engaged in melee combat, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can reincarnate the creature as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.fsPruAIDOg4tVrgb]{gladiator}.

If the gladiator reduces at least three creatures to 0 hp within 1 minute of its reincarnation, it transforms into an @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.xZwjCq10z1dRNgcI]{einherjar} (see page 156).

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can provide ascension to up to two creatures each hour with this reaction.

affects.special: Friendly creature within the valkyrie's Aura of Valor

Burrow Awareness.name: Burrow Awareness
Burrow Awareness.description: A [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks if at least one other [[lookup @name lowercase]] within 10 feet of it isn’t incapacitated.

Forest Camouflage.name: Forest Camouflage
Forest Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

Speak with Plants.name: 植物交谈
Speak with Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with plants as if they shared a language.

Withering Turban.name: Withering Turban
Withering Turban.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.

The target has disadvantage on this saving throw if it failed the saving throw against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Thirst Aura]].

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest with no levels of exhaustion.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

HP Max -4.name: HP Max -4
HP Max -4.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 4.

HP Max -5.name: HP Max -5
HP Max -5.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 5.

HP Max -6.name: HP Max -6
HP Max -6.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 6.

HP Max -7.name: HP Max -7
HP Max -7.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 7.

HP Max -8.name: HP Max -8
HP Max -8.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 8.

HP Max -9.name: HP Max -9
HP Max -9.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 9.

HP Max -10.name: HP Max -10
HP Max -10.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 10.

HP Max -11.name: HP Max -11
HP Max -11.description: The target's HP maximum is reduced by 11.

Vomit Forth the Deeps.name: Vomit Forth the Deeps
Vomit Forth the Deeps.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sprays half‑digested food from its maw in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t incapacitated.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] engulfs a Large or smaller creature grappled by it.

The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}, &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns or take [[/damage average]] damage, as the creature is lacerated by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s sand-coated form.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, any engulfed creatures move with it.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than two creatures engulfed at a time.

affects.special: Large or smaller creature grappled by the mimic

Engulfed.name: Engulfed
Engulfed.description: The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}, &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, and unable to breathe.

Undead Nature.name: Undead Nature
Undead Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Leaping Pounce.name: Leaping Pounce
Leaping Pounce.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps at least [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a [[/item Claw]] attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=prone]{prone}.

If the target is prone, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one [[/item Beak]] attack against it as a bonus action.

Children of the Lower Planes.name: Children of the Lower Planes
Children of the Lower Planes.description:
The pact vampire magically calls [[/r 2d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.kz2fW9xb5CcvXLX4]{dretches}, [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.dLQiESMsfsXijD5c]{imps}, or 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.9ggQBmAKXraOtz7S]{bearded devil}.

The called Fiends arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands.

The Fiends remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

Drowning Hair.name: Drowning Hair
Drowning Hair.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s long hair tangles around a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has grappled.

The creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, or half damage with a successful [[/save format=long]].

In addition, until it escapes the rusalka’s grapple, it is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and has disadvantage on Strength checks to break free of the grapple.

save.condition: When grappled by the attacking creature

Drowning Hair.name: Drowning Hair
Drowning Hair.description: The target is is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and has disadvantage on Strength checks to break free of the grapple.

Teleport.name: 传送术
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name]] magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space she can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet.

Rust Drake Lockjaw.name: Rust Drake Lockjaw
Rust Drake Lockjaw.description:
A creature infected with this disease manifests symptoms [[/r 1d4]] days after infection, which include painful muscle spasms, particularly in the jaw.

At the end of each long rest, the infected creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 hour and have its Dexterity score reduced by [[/r 1d4]].

This reduction lasts until the disease is cured.

If the disease reduces the creature’s Dexterity to 0, the creature dies.

A creature that succeeds on two saving throws recovers from the disease.

save.condition: Infected creature

Harvester Venom.name: Harvester Venom
Harvester Venom.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] produces a potent poison that liquefies the innards of those affected by it.

Every hour that elapses after a creature succumbs to this poison, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage, and its hp maximum is reduced by that amount.

Creatures with resistance or immunity to poison or the poisoned condition can be affected by this poison. Such creatures have advantage on the saving throw.

This potent poison remains within the creature’s body until removed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

If a creature dies while suffering from this poison, it rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.tubcO7kaQ4w0soxS]{lemure} 1 hour later under the control of the nearest non-lemure devil within 1 mile.

Grasping Limbs.name: Grasping Limbs
Grasping Limbs.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can wield weapons and hold, grasp, push, pull, or interact with objects that might otherwise require a Humanoid form to accomplish.

Corpse Breath.name: Corpse Breath
Corpse Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spews forth a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]‑foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] of putrid gas.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Electrified Tendrils.name: Electrified Tendrils
Electrified Tendrils.description:
A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

In addition, a creature that starts its turn beneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hovering takes [[/damage average activity=BRF6UtVZKYjCEq0H]] damage, provided the creature is within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=BRF6UtVZKYjCEq0H]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Unravel.name: Unravel
Unravel.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends one magical effect it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her.

To do so, it must succeed on a Charisma check against a DC of 10 + the spell’s level or the magical effect’s DC, whichever is higher.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot-radius wind storm.

The storm imposes disadvantage on ranged weapon attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks based on sight or hearing within the area.

The winds extinguish open flames and disperse fog.

A flying creature in the storm must land at the end of its turn or fall.

Each creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s area is &Reference[difficult terrain] for any creature other than the slow storm.

Familiar.name: Familiar
Familiar.description:
A [[lookup @name lowercase]] occasionally chooses to serve an evil spellcaster as a familiar. They are too mischievous to be especially loyal or trustworthy, but they are ferocious in defense of their master, feeling as possessive toward the master as other dragons might a piece of a hoard.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion.

While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other.

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Magic Resistance]] trait.

At any time and for any reason, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

Secure Tail.name: Secure Tail
Secure Tail.description:
When within 10 feet of the ground, structure, wall, or other solid surface, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can secure its tail spike on a point in the surface within 10 feet of it.

While secured, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be knocked prone, it can’t move more than 10 feet from that point, and its [[/item Chain Tail]] attack’s reach is reduced to 5 feet.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached to a creature while its tail is secured, the creature is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is no longer attached to it.

Temporal Body.name: Temporal Body
Temporal Body.description: When a [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to a slow spell, haste spell, or similar effect, it automatically succeeds on any saving throws required by the spell or effect and regains [[/heal average]].

Rainbow Arch.name: Rainbow Arch
Rainbow Arch.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can instantaneously teleport between sources of fresh water within 1 mile as an action. It can’t move normally or take any other action on the turn when it uses this power.

When this power is activated, a rainbow manifests between the origin and destination, lasting for 1 minute.

Forest Ambusher.name: Forest Ambusher
Forest Ambusher.description: While in a forest, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take the &Reference[Hide] action.

Endless Breath.name: Endless Breath
Endless Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] breathes air, but it can hold its breath for years.

Word-Bound.name: Word-Bound
Word-Bound.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always knows the direction and distance to any creature that dispels, breaks, or otherwise avoids the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JQyigMNPiDnGI18b]{geas} of the promise it made via [[/item Planar Ultimatum]], provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and the creature are on the same plane of existence.

While grappling such a creature, it can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]{banishment} spell as a bonus action (spell save DC 17) on that creature.

Ghostly Body.name: Ghostly Body
Ghostly Body.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to acid, fire, lightning, and thunder damage, it has immunity to the prone condition, and it has immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes [[/damage 1d10 force average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect is available on the Effects tab of this character sheet to activate the Resistances Benefits. By default, it is disabled.

Benefits: Void Ghost Form.name: Benefits: Void Ghost Form
Benefits: Void Ghost Form.description: The nihileth has resistance to acid, fire, lightning, and thunder damage, it has immunity to the prone condition, and it has immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

Limb Sweep.name: Limb Sweep
Limb Sweep.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sweeps its wingless limbs outward.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Fog Flow.name: Fog Flow
Fog Flow.description: While in fog or mist, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow at 1 inch wide without squeezing, provided the fog or mist is flowing through the space.

Nightmare Mount.name: Nightmare Mount
Nightmare Mount.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has formed a bond with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.5SgVGhQBswgWRwsF]{nightmare}.

The nightmare acts as a controlled mount while carrying the [[lookup @name lowercase]], obeying the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s spoken commands.

Mounting and dismounting the nightmare costs the [[lookup @name lowercase]] only 5 feet of movement.

Windborne.name: Windborne
Windborne.description:
In windy conditions, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s flying speed increases to 30 feet. In a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour), its flying speed increases to 60 feet.

Foundry Note

Active Effects are available on the Effects tab to adjust the creature's movement speed depending on the conditions.

Hurl Moonlight.name: Hurl Moonlight
Hurl Moonlight.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Dehydrating Fists.name: Dehydrating Fists
Dehydrating Fists.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Slam]] attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with a Slam attack, the attack deals an extra 4d8 necrotic damage (included in the attack).

Vermin Breath.name: Vermin Breath
Vermin Breath.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.S0zDrv6lbnwWaz9E]{swarms of insects} in spaces he can see within 30 feet.

The swarms take their turns immediately after [[lookup @name lowercase]], and they are allies of [[lookup @name lowercase]], obeying his telepathic commands.

They remain for 1 minute, until [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

[[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than five swarms of insects under his control at a time.

Thick Hide.name: Thick Hide
Thick Hide.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s skin is thick and tough, granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus is already factored into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s AC.

Light-Infused Fists.name: Light-Infused Fists
Light-Infused Fists.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Slam]] attacks are magical.

When the golem hits with a Slam attack, the attack deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Frightening Mien.name: Frightening Mien
Frightening Mien.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] briefly appears to grow to an enormous size, taking on a malicious mien before returning to normal.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can see it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

A creature is immune to Frightening Mien if it can see through illusions.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Word of Pain.name: Word of Pain
Word of Pain.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn as pain courses through its body.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that will set disadvantage on ability saves and skill checks. However, there is not any automation at this will set disadvantage on attack rolls.

Disadv. d20 Tests.name: Disadv. d20 Tests
Disadv. d20 Tests.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Standing Leap.name: Standing Leap
Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s long jump is up to 30 feet and tis high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

Acid Spit.name: Acid Spit
Acid Spit.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spits acid in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] that is [[lookup @target.template.width activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet wide.

Each creature in that line must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Bonded Savior.name: Bonded Savior
Bonded Savior.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s bonded ward takes damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] prevents the ward from taking the damage and loses hp equal to that amount instead, regardless of the type of damage dealt.

Arboreal Escape.name: Arboreal Escape
Arboreal Escape.description: While in a tree, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

Land Bound.name: Land Bound
Land Bound.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is bound to an area of land or ocean no larger than 100 square miles.

If it leaves this region, it loses its [[/item Spawn Elemental]] action.

If it remains outside the region, it automatically teleports back to the center of this area after 24 hours, regardless of distance.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be frightened while it can see an ally within 30 feet of it.

Chaos Mutations.name: Chaos Mutations
Chaos Mutations.description:
At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body experiences a mutation. Choose an option or roll a [[/r d6]] to determine the type of mutation.

The mutation lasts until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

  1. Acid Boils. The next creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within [[lookup @range.value activity=UgzTW2mov8G4mreY]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average activity=UgzTW2mov8G4mreY]] damage.

  2. Acid Saliva. The next melee attack the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes that hits a creature deals an extra [[/damage average activity=NQktWczTtYNsa1Hn]] damage to the creature.

  3. Extra Eyes. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on the next attack roll it makes.

  4. Extra Hooves. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s speed increases by 10 feet, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke &Reference[opportunity attacks] when it moves out of an enemy’s reach.

  5. Second Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains [[/heal average]].

  6. Toughened Hide. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (the rift swine’s choice).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) on the Extra Eyes activity that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate advantage on the next attack roll.

Advantage Next Attack.name: Advantage Next Attack
Advantage Next Attack.description: The rift swine has advantage on the next attack roll it makes.

Speed +10.name: Speed +10
Speed +10.description: The rift swine's speed increases by 10 until the start of your next turn.

Bludgeoning DR.name: Bludgeoning DR
Bludgeoning DR.description: The rift swine has resistance to bludgeoning damage until the start of his next turn.

Piercing DR.name: Piercing DR
Piercing DR.description: The rift swine has resistance to piercing damage until the start of his next turn.

Slashing DR.name: Slashing DR
Slashing DR.description: The rift swine has resistance to slashing damage until the start of his next turn.

Wire Jump.name: Wire Jump
Wire Jump.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a hooked wire at a point on a surface, such as the ground or wall, it can see within 30 feet of it, attaching one end of the wire to that point.

It then reels in the wire, pulling itself to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of that point. It can bring along objects and willing creatures as long as their total weight doesn’t exceed 100 pounds.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase] moves in this way, &Reference[opportunity attacks]] against it have disadvantage.

Healing Tonic.name: Healing Tonic
Healing Tonic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] administers a healing tonic to a willing creature within 5 feet of it. The target magically regains [[/heal average]] and is freed from any disease or poison.

Immortal Nature.name: Immortal Nature
Immortal Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require food, drink, or sleep.

Stomp.name: 重踏
Stomp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

Lightwalking.name: Lightwalking
Lightwalking.description: Once on its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use half its movement to step magically into one area of moonlight within its reach and emerge from a second area of moonlight within 80 feet of the first, appearing in an unoccupied space within that second area.

Primordial Aura.name: Primordial Aura
Primordial Aura.description:
A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage.

A creature that finishes a long rest within [[lookup @range.value activity=nHit192BelGDtfUW]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=nHit192BelGDtfUW]] or develop tumors across its body and become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the tumors are removed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: Upon awakening from your long rest, you notice tumors have developed all over your body, and your blood is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

Radiant Jaws.name: Radiant Jaws
Radiant Jaws.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Bite]] attacks are magical.

When it hits with a Bite attack, the Bite deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Rotten Drain.name: Rotten Drain
Rotten Drain.description: One creature infected with the [[/item nihilethic rot]] disease within 30 feet of the nihileth takes [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains hp equal to that amount.

Radiant Weapons.name: Radiant Weapons
Radiant Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 16 (3d10) radiant damage (included in the attack).

Sensuous Grace.name: Sensuous Grace
Sensuous Grace.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves with a flowing grace that Humanoids find appealing.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet on its turn, each Humanoid within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it that can see it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the end of its next turn.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]的近战武器攻击命中目标时，其伤害加上额外一粒伤害骰（已包含在攻击条目中）。

Dimensional Stomp.name: Dimensional Stomp
Dimensional Stomp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be teleported to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet of it.

save.condition: When hit

Hypersensitive Hearing.name: Hypersensitive Hearing
Hypersensitive Hearing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing, and it can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

Relentless.name: 坚韧
Relentless.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 15 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hp, it is reduced to 1 hp instead.

Swarming Cough.name: Swarming Cough
Swarming Cough.description:
The [[lookup @name]] belches forth a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.S0zDrv6lbnwWaz9E]{swarm of insects}.

The swarm is an ally of the [[lookup @name]], obeys its spoken commands, and takes its turn immediately after the spawn’s.

The swarm remains for 1 minute, until the [[lookup @name]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name]] dismisses it as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] can have no more than two swarms under its control at a time.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对物件和建筑物造成双倍伤害。

Dwarven Resilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
Dwarven Resilience.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against poison.

Last Breath.name: Last Breath
Last Breath.description:
The first time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 hp, it drops to 1 hp instead and its [[/item Draconic Breath]] automatically recharges.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] transforms into raw energy of the type noted in its [[/item Breath Born]] trait.

While in this energy form, it is immune to all damage and to being grappled or restrained.

At the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, it is destroyed.

Damage & Condition Immunities.name: Damage & Condition Immunities
Damage & Condition Immunities.description: While in this energy form, it is immune to all damage and to being grappled or restrained.

Illusory Appearance.name: Illusory Appearance
Illusory Appearance.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] covers itself and anything it is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes it look like another creature of its general size and Humanoid shape.

The illusion ends if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes a bonus action to end it or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching it would feel its rough, sand-like skin.

Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a [[/check format=long]] to discern that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is disguised.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name]] regains [[/heal]] at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

Warming Presence.name: Warming Presence
Warming Presence.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and each creature within 5 feet of it are immune to the effects of cold environments, provided the cold is caused by naturally occurring weather and climate.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is inside a structure, it can choose for this trait to affect all creatures within the structure (no action required), regardless of how close they are to it.

Cold DI.name: Cold DI
Cold DI.description: While within 5 feet of the firebird, you are immune to the effects of cold environments, provided the cold is caused by naturally occurring weather and climate.

Eldritch Weapons.name: Eldritch Weapons
Eldritch Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 force damage (included in the attack).

Ink Cloud.name: Ink Cloud
Ink Cloud.description:
While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot-radius cloud of ink all around itself.

Each creature in the cloud must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The area is &Reference[heavily obscured] for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink.

Planar Sense.name: Planar Sense
Planar Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of creatures not native to the plane the [[lookup @name lowercase]] currently occupies and planar portals within 60 feet of it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can sense the general direction of such creatures and portals within 1 mile of it.

Consume.name: 耗用
Consume.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Bite]] attack or uses [[/item Swallow]].

Flow.name: Flow
Flow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to his walking speed, or swims up to half his swimming speed, without provoking &Reference[opportunity attacks].

Flame Burst.name: Flame Burst
Flame Burst.description:
While riding a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.5SgVGhQBswgWRwsF]{nightmare}, the mavka channels her power into her mount, causing its fiery light to burn those nearby.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the mavka must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Hidden Home.name: Hidden Home
Hidden Home.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 1 minute scribing a magical symbol on a wall, baseboard, cupboard, or other semi-permanent object within a structure.

The symbol remains until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] inscribes another symbol elsewhere. While within 5 feet of the surface where the symbol is inscribed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use an action to touch the symbol and be transported to an extradimensional space just large enough to hold the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to 50 pounds of nonmagical objects.

Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter this space, along with any nonmagical objects it is wearing or carrying, up to the extradimensional space’s limits. While inside the extradimensional space, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see out as if through a 2-foot-by-2-foot window centered on the symbol and can exit the space as an action, appearing in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the surface where the symbol is inscribed.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is killed or if it creates a second symbol while objects remain within the extradimensional space, the objects are safely ejected to an unoccupied space nearest the surface where the first symbol was inscribed.

Insanity.name: Insanity
Insanity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Vine Seed.name: Vine Seed
Vine Seed.description:
A creature infected with a [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s vine seed suffers near-constant pain as the seed takes root and spreads tendrils throughout its body.

For the first 24 hours after infection, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, as the pain from the spreading roots distracts it. Then, the seed becomes a disease, devouring the creature from the inside as it grows vines throughout the creature’s body.

Until the disease is cured, the infected creature can’t regain hp, and its hp maximum decreases by 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) for every 24 hours that elapse. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if this disease reduces its hp maximum to 0.

This potent disease can be cured only by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

Alternatively, a creature can take 10 minutes and remove the growing seed from the infected creature within the first 24 hours of infection by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

A Humanoid slain by this disease rises 24 hours later as a @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.OoOuG21mjJohDX3c]{tendril puppet} under the vine lord’s control.

HP Max. Reduction.name: HP Max. Reduction
HP Max. Reduction.condition: If infected with a Vine Seed. Repeat this effect every 24 hours until the disease is cured

affects.special: Repeat this effect every 24 hours until the disease is cured

Tendril Puppet Rises.name: Tendril Puppet Rises
Tendril Puppet Rises.condition: If a Humanoid is slain by by the Vine Seed disease

affects.special: A Humanoid slain by this disease

Vine Seed Infection.name: Vine Seed Infection
Vine Seed Infection.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Cone of Negation.name: Cone of Negation
Cone of Negation.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] projects null energy in a 30-foot cone.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and any spell of 4th level or lower on the creature ends, as if it had been the target of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{dispel magic} spell.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and spells on it don’t end.

Grasping Slam.name: Grasping Slam
Grasping Slam.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 17) if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and takes [[/damage average activity=W5yRggrOZu95gmqD]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the herald can’t use its Grasping Slam on another target.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}.

Strangle.name: Strangle
Strangle.description: A creature enshrouded by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and begin &Reference[suffocation]{suffocating}, as the air is squeezed from its lungs.

Sufficating.name: Sufficating
Sufficating.description: The target is &Reference[suffocation]{suffocating}, as the air is squeezed from its lungs.

Spiked Climb.name: Spiked Climb
Spiked Climb.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses its spikes to hold itself in place while climbing, allowing it to climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

If it climbs upside down on a ceiling or suspends itself on a vertical surface while leaving its claws free, it can’t use the Ruff Spikes reaction.

Poisoned Needle Shuttle.name: Poisoned Needle Shuttle
Poisoned Needle Shuttle.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Snow Stride.name: Snow Stride
Snow Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical snow and ice in addition to sand, earth, and mud. In addition, &Reference[difficult terrain] composed of snow or ice doesn’t cost it extra movement.

Alluring Presence.name: Alluring Presence
Alluring Presence.description:
When a Humanoid that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force it to make a [[/save format=long]] if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't incapacitated and can see the Humanoid.

On a failed save, the Humanoid is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the start if its next turn.

While charmed, the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and must move on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for a kiss from her.

The Humanoid doesn’t avoid &Reference[opportunity attacks], but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage, the Humanoid can repeat the saving throw.

If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends for it, and it regains its senses for the remainder of its turn. Unless surprised, a Humanoid can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn.

If the Humanoid does so, it can’t see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If the Humanoid looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the start if its next turn.

While charmed, the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}.

Charming Touch.name: Charming Touch
Charming Touch.description:
One creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=long]{charmed} for 10 minutes.

If the target suffers any harm, the effect ends. Otherwise, the target can repeat the saving throw at the end of every minute, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous creature ends.

Infused Arsenal.name: Infused Arsenal
Infused Arsenal.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit with a nonmagical melee weapon or when it starts its turn in the same space as a nonmagical melee weapon that isn’t being worn or carried, it absorbs the weapon into its body.

If the weapon is being wielded by an attacker, the attacker must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or lose its weapon.

For 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to the type of damage dealt by that weapon, and when it hits with its [[/item Bladed Fist]], the fist deals an extra 1d4 damage of the type dealt by the weapon.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can absorb no more than three weapons in this way every 24 hours.

Foundry Note

There are three Active Effects in the Resistance from Absorbed Weapon activity to apply either bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage resistance to the reaver. Select only one damage type.

The additional 1d4 damage is implemented on Bladed Fist.

Save: Attacker Loses Weapon (On Hit).name: Save: Attacker Loses Weapon (On Hit)
Save: Attacker Loses Weapon (On Hit).condition: when the reaver is hit by a nonmagical melee weapon

affects.special: attacking the reaver with a melee weapon

Resistance from Absorbed Weapon.name: Resistance from Absorbed Weapon
Resistance from Absorbed Weapon.condition: Only after a successful absorption (on-hit fail or unattended start-of-turn)

range.special: Triggered; no more than three weapons per 24 hours

Absorb Weapon (on hit).name: Absorb Weapon (on hit)
Absorb Weapon (on hit).condition: Hit with a nonmagical melee weapon or when it starts its turn in the same space as a nonmagical melee weapon

Apply Bludgeoning DR.name: Apply Bludgeoning DR
Apply Bludgeoning DR.description: You have resistance to bludgeoning damage for 1 minute.

Apply Piercing DR.name: Apply Piercing DR
Apply Piercing DR.description: You have resistance to piercing damage for 1 minute.

Apply Slashing DR.name: Apply Slashing DR
Apply Slashing DR.description: You have resistance to slashing damage for 1 minute.

Tidal Breath.name: Tidal Breath
Tidal Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales a crushing wave of frigid seawater in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is pushed up to 45 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn’t pushed or knocked prone.

Alchemical Bolt.name: Alchemical Bolt
Alchemical Bolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] of the type determined by [[/item Apothecary]].

Shift Moonlight.name: Shift Moonlight
Shift Moonlight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] changes the brightness of each area of moonlight he can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of him from dim light to bright light or vice versa.

Crush.name: 碾压术
Crush.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] launches most of its massive bulk into the air and crashes down on the ground in a 20-foot line that is 10 feet wide.

It then retracts itself into a space along that line and can occupy the space of one or more Large or smaller creatures.

Each creature in the line must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, is knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}, and is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} while it shares a space with the [[lookup @name lowercase]], as it is pinned beneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage, isn’t knocked prone, and is pushed out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space into an unoccupied space of the creature’s choice within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

A creature, including the restrained creature, can take its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] burrows along the surface of the earth at least 20 feet before using this action, creatures in the line have disadvantage on the saving throw.

Hold Breath.name: Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Enchanted Antlers.name: Enchanted Antlers
Enchanted Antlers.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s attacks with its [[/item Antler Glaive]] are magical.

When the far [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with an Antler Glaive attack, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 force damage (included in the attack).

Shadow Construction.name: Shadow Construction
Shadow Construction.description: Made mostly of shadow, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] bursts into pieces then dissipates when a creature scores a critical hit against it.

Seize Strand.name: Seize Strand
Seize Strand.description:
One creature whose fate is corrupted by this [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be affected by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JQyigMNPiDnGI18b]{geas} spell for 8 hours.

While under the geas, the affected creature must perform a specific, seemingly minor task that furthers the decades-long goals of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Such a task could be writing a letter to a specific person, damaging a seemingly random piece of equipment, or speaking a specific sentence to a particular person.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use Seize Strand on a particular creature no more than once every 24 hours, regardless of success or failure on the saving throw.

Bone Camouflage.name: Bone Camouflage
Bone Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide among bones.

Hive’s Heart.name: Hive’s Heart
Hive’s Heart.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the direction and distance to all members of her hive and the range of her telepathy extends to 20 miles when communicating with a member of her hive.

Bred to the Saddle.name: Bred to the Saddle
Bred to the Saddle.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be charmed or frightened while it has a rider.

Explosive Flask.name: Explosive Flask
Explosive Flask.description:
The kobold [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a flask of volatile substances at a point it can see within 30 feet of it.

The flask explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage of the type determined by [[/item Apothecary]] and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Contortionist.name: Contortionist
Contortionist.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can contort its body into unnatural positions, allowing it to easily move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s destination must still have suitable room to accommodate its volume.

Absorption.name: Absorption
Absorption.description:
When a friendly rat, giant rat, or swarm of rats starts its turn within 5 feet of the rat king, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can absorb it.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] does so, the target dies, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains temporary hp equal to the target’s remaining hp.

Keen Touch.name: Keen Touch
Keen Touch.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on vibrations.

Decapitation.name: Decapitation
Decapitation.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a quick, cutting gesture at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it that has a head and that is below half its hp maximum.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A target that fails the saving throw also has one of its heads cut off.

The creature dies if it can’t survive without the lost head.

Decapitated.name: Decapitated
Decapitated.description: A target that fails the saving throw also has one of its heads cut off.

Children of the Forest.name: Children of the Forest
Children of the Forest.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.lZR4lhNmYSf89s4Q]{boars}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.UTuKdTah1DKfPwWe]{constrictor snakes}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.yawTeS8u2FCfzzZH]{wolves}, or it calls 1 @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.Ohh7x37UUuvxapTC]{child of the briar}.

The called creatures arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying her spoken commands.

The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Portal Sense.name: Portal Sense
Portal Sense.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of planar portals within 100 feet of it and can sense the general direction of planar portals within 1 mile of it.

In addition, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] spends 10 minutes studying a portal, it can determine the portal’s destination and any requirements to use or activate it.

Infest Vermin.name: Infest Vermin
Infest Vermin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] infests a Large or smaller Beast with an exoskeleton within 5 feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] no longer infests it.

Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=6gPHOLlCtPwtcwu6]] damage, and its hp maximum is reduced by that amount. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] no longer infests it. The target dies if this reduces its hp maximum to 0.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then takes control of the body, dissolving the flesh and hiding within the exoskeleton.

A target that succeeds on two consecutive saving throws forces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of its body and is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Infest Vermin for the next 24 hours.

save.condition: If the skitterhaunt damages a Large or smaller Beast with an exoskeleton

6gPHOLlCtPwtcwu6.condition: Triggered automatically every 24 hours while infested.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description:
The dragon exhales fire in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Each creature in that area must also succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=eORCHBtPYvAvs6wG]] or go on a rampage for 1 minute.

A rampaging creature must attack the nearest creature other than the dragon on its turn. If no other creature is near enough to move to and attack, the rampaging creature stalks off in a random direction, seeking a target for its rage.

The rampaging creature can repeat the Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Disgrace Bound.name: Disgrace Bound
Disgrace Bound.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is bound to a tomb, castle ruins, or other place related to the disgrace in life that caused it to rise as a [[lookup @name lowercase]] in death.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn more than 1 mile from its bound location, it loses its [[/item Spectral Blade]] action until it returns to the region.

If it remains outside the region, it automatically teleports back to its bound location after 24 hours, regardless of distance.

Wrapping Embrace.name: Wrapping Embrace
Wrapping Embrace.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can occupy a Medium or smaller creature’s space and vice versa. It has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space as it.

Healing Touch.name: Healing Touch
Healing Touch.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches another creature.

The target magically regains [[/heal average]] and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

Elemental Nature.name: Elemental Nature
Elemental Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Trapdoor Ambush.name: Trapdoor Ambush
Trapdoor Ambush.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is burrowed just below the surface of sand and a Medium or smaller creature enters the space on the surface just above where it is burrowed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Impaling Leg]] attack against the creature, bursting from the sand and revealing itself in the process.

The target has disadvantage on the saving throw to avoid being grappled.

utility.condition: when a creature walks over a sand spider’s hidden burrow

Keen Sight.name: 敏锐视觉
Keen Sight.description: [[lookup @name]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Animate Shadows.name: Animate Shadows
Animate Shadows.description:
The [[lookup @name]] causes the shadows of up to three creatures he can see within 60 feet of him to animate and attack their owners.

Each target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, and its Strength score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]].

On a success, a creature takes half the damage, and its Strength score isn’t reduced.

This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if this effect reduces its Strength to 0.

STR Score -1.name: STR Score -1
STR Score -1.description: You STR score is reduced until the end of your next long-rest.

STR Score -2.name: STR Score -2
STR Score -2.description: You STR score is reduced until the end of your next long-rest.

STR Score -3.name: STR Score -3
STR Score -3.description: You STR score is reduced until the end of your next long-rest.

STR Score -4.name: STR Score -4
STR Score -4.description: You STR score is reduced until the end of your next long-rest.

Earth Glide.name: Earth Glide
Earth Glide.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]免疫任何可以改变其形态的法术或效应。

Induce Doubt.name: Induce Doubt
Induce Doubt.description:
If a creature misses the strife with an attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cause the attacker to doubt itself.

The attacker must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or each time it makes an attack roll or saving throw before the end of its next turn, it must roll a [[/r d4]] and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

save.condition: If another creature's attack on the strife misses

affects.special: Who misses the strife with a their attack

In Doubt of Themself.name: In Doubt of Themself
In Doubt of Themself.description:
You now doubt yourself.

On each attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn, you must roll a [[/r d4]] and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

Water Bound.name: Water Bound
Water Bound.description: For every hour the [[lookup @name lowercase]] spends on dry land, its hp maximum is reduced by 2 ([[/r 1d4]]).

Compel.name: Compel
Compel.description:
The emerald eye magically compels one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it to move.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} by the eye for 1 minute.

At the start of each of the charmed target’s turns, the emerald eye chooses a direction horizontal to the eye, and the target must use as much of its movement as possible to move in that direction on its turn. The target can take its action before it moves.

The target can’t be compelled to move into an obviously deadly hazard, such as a fire or pit, but it will provoke &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] to move in the designated direction.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} by the eye for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Shadow Call.name: Shadow Call
Shadow Call.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a ranged attack, it can make one [[/item Shadow Bolt]] attack against the attacker.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have disadvantage on this attack from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.

Soul Sense.name: Soul Sense
Soul Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of creatures that have souls within 60 feet of it and can sense the general direction of such creatures within 1 mile of it.

Influence Weather.name: Influence Weather
Influence Weather.description:
Nearby weather responds to [[lookup @name]]'s desires.

At the start of each minute, [[lookup @name]] can choose to change the precipitation and wind within 3 miles of him by one stage, up or down (no action required).

This effect works like the changing weather conditions aspect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZPd73HtKF3At11jh]{control weather} spell, except [[lookup @name]] can’t change the temperature and the conditions change immediately.

Shadow Weapons.name: Shadow Weapons
Shadow Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the shadow beast hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 necrotic damage (included in the attack).

Magic-Infused Weapons.name: Magic-Infused Weapons
Magic-Infused Weapons.description:
The power coursing through the corrupted [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s veins flows into its weapons. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 force damage (included in the attack).

Contagious Lightning.name: Contagious Lightning
Contagious Lightning.description:
A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a metal weapon while within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it receives a discharge of lightning.

The creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or attract lightning for 1 minute.

For the duration, attacks that deal lightning damage have advantage against the affected creature, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal lightning damage, and if the creature takes lightning damage, it is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bibliophile.name: Bibliophile
Bibliophile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] understands any written language it can see, provided it is touching the surface on which the words are written.

Call Rats.name: Call Rats
Call Rats.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 2d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.pozQUPTnLZW8epox]{rats}, [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.q1YJIeIt6rK8fCKn]{giant rats}, or 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.8ihbbjkaOFTPbI73]{swarm of rats}.

The rats arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its spoken commands.

The rats remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Beast Hunter.name: 野兽猎人
Beast Hunter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track Beasts and on Intelligence (Nature) checks to recall information about Beasts.

Water Walker.name: Water Walker
Water Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across the surface of water as if it were harmless, solid ground. This trait works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.YBda6nLKjxdT1LbS]{water walk} spell.

Deft Snow Walk.name: Deft Snow Walk
Deft Snow Walk.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain composed of ice and snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone while in icy or snowy terrain.

Hideous Cacophony.name: Hideous Cacophony
Hideous Cacophony.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s many mouths constantly emit whistles, fluting, and other high-pitched noises. It has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to be unheard.

Each creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can hear it must make a [[/save format=long or be disoriented until the start of its next turn.

A disoriented creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}, and when it moves, it moves in a random direction. Unless &Reference[surprise]{surprised}, a creature can cover its ears to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can’t hear until the start of its next turn, when it can cover its ears again.

If the creature uncovers its ears in the meantime while within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it must immediately make the save.

A creature that is covering its ears and that has access to cloth, wax, or similar material can stuff its ears with the material as a bonus action to free up its hands, deafening itself while the material remains stuffed in its ears.

Disoriented.name: 迷失
Disoriented.description: The target is disoriented until the start of its next turn. A disoriented creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}.

Grease Spray.name: Grease Spray
Grease Spray.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s chest fires a spray of alchemical grease on a point on the ground within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The grease covers a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]] centered on that point, and the area is &Reference[difficult terrain].

Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=q5qLR7ChyfJFY6l4]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Save: Enters/Ends Turn.name: Save: Enters/Ends Turn
Save: Enters/Ends Turn.condition: Enters or ends their turn in the grease

Gravedust.name: Gravedust
Gravedust.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] projects a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] of grave dust.

Each creature in the area must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage.

If a creature is a Humanoid, it must also succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=5o965GuV24aOc1UW]] or contract the darakhul fever disease (see the Darakhul Fever sidebar in Biography).

Rock.name: 掷石
Rock.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Plane-Altered Breath.name: Plane-Altered Breath
Plane-Altered Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales raw magic in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Consuming Inferno.name: Consuming Inferno
Consuming Inferno.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s controller can command the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to rapidly burn through the remains of its wick, creating a devastating ball of fire.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area and that aren’t being worn or carried ignite.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then dies, becoming a lifeless puddle of wax.

Gaze of Doom.name: Gaze of Doom
Gaze of Doom.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s gaze foretells a doomed fate for one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Sunlight Weakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
Sunlight Weakness.description:
While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect in the Effect tab that provides disadvantage on ability saves and skill checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls at this time.

Sunlight Weakness.name: 日光弱点
Sunlight Weakness.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Nihilethic Rot.name: Nihilethic Rot
Nihilethic Rot.description:
This disease takes 1 minute to manifest in an infected creature, during which time the disease can be removed with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{lesser restoration} spell.

After 1 minute, the creature’s flesh becomes slimy and translucent, and the disease can be cured only by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qcYitWoSMTnKkzM1]{heal} spell or similar magic.

Until this disease is cured, the creature can’t regain hp unless it is submerged in water, and it can breathe air and water.

The creature must be submerged in water at least once every 2 hours to avoid suffocating, and if it is outside a body of water, it takes [[/damage average]] damage every 10 minutes, unless moisture is applied to its skin before 10 minutes have passed.

If a Humanoid dies while infected with this disease, it rises 1 minute later as a @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.nxIF7dD1BdAx8QxO]{nihilethic zombie} under the nihileth’s control.

If a Large giant or monstrosity dies while infected with this disease, it rises 1 minute later as a @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.W3W4zy0sVW1VEZNe]{nihilethic dominator} under the nihileth’s control.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Ichorous Infusion.name: Ichorous Infusion
Ichorous Infusion.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ingests an infusion made from Mechuiti’s blood.

For 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws and ability checks that use Strength and Constitution, and its walking and climbing speeds are doubled.

In addition, it has disadvantage on saving throws and ability checks that use Intelligence and Wisdom for the duration.

A non-behtu that ingests the infusion must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] typically has [[/r 1d4 + 1]] infusions in its possession.

Foundry Note

Five infusions are configured.

An Active Effect is available to enable in the Effects tab of the sheet that applies the benefits of this feature to the Behtu.

Additionally, in D&D 5e, there is generally no reason to have all 18 skills exposed in an NPC's stat block. The FoundryVTT NPC actor sheet only lists the skills that the creature is proficient in, to make the GM's job faster and easier.

However, this creature explicitly grants benefits to several skills that this creature is not proficient, so all skills are displayed.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Light Form.name: Light Form
Light Form.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

In addition, it sheds bright light in a 10- to 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can alter the radius as a bonus action.

Foundry Note

The light the [[lookup @name lowercase]] radiates is not configured.

Void Traveler.name: Void Traveler
Void Traveler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, sleep, or ambient pressure. It requires only minimal exposure to starlight a few times each year to sustain itself.

Reel.name: 拖拽
Reel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature grappled by it up to 10 feet straight toward it.

Familiar (Variant).name: Familiar (Variant)
Familiar (Variant).description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion.

While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other.

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion has resistance to psychic damage.

At any time and for any reason, the automaton can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

Psychic Damage Resistance.name: Psychic Damage Resistance
Psychic Damage Resistance.description: When the familiar is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion has resistance to psychic damage.

Snowsight.name: Snowsight
Snowsight.description: The [[lookup @name]] can see through areas obscured by snowfall, sleet, rain, and other wintry precipitation without penalty.

Fascinating Purr.name: Fascinating Purr
Fascinating Purr.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] purrs loudly at a Humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it and that can hear it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed}.

While charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and must move on its turn toward the cat by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the cat and pet or hold it.

The target doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the cat, the target can repeat the saving throw.

A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Fascinating Purr for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against any creature petting or holding it.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed}.

While charmed, the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and must move on its turn toward the cat by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the cat and pet or hold it.

A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Agonizing Aura.name: Agonizing Aura
Agonizing Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits ultrasonic noise and minor vibrations that cause pain and subtly disrupt the functions of most creatures.

A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

Creatures with resistance or immunity to thunder damage automatically succeed on the saving throw.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder but does not automate disadvantage on attack rolls.

Disadv. Attack Rolls.name: Disadv. Attack Rolls
Disadv. Attack Rolls.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

Leng Rejuvenation.name: Leng Rejuvenation
Leng Rejuvenation.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies on the Material Plane, it gains a new body in [[/r 1d10]] days, regaining all its hp and becoming active again, unless it is killed with radiant damage wielded by a good-aligned creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water within 24 hours of its death.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s new body appears in its family’s crypt in Leng.

Staff of Leng.name: Staff of Leng
Staff of Leng.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Wing Attack.name: 振翅攻击
Wing Attack.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings.

Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then fly up to half its flying speed.

Shadow Stealth.name: Shadow Stealth
Shadow Stealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

utility.condition: While in dim light or darkness

Darkness Regeneration.name: Darkness Regeneration
Darkness Regeneration.description: While in an area of dim light or darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/heal]] at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp.

Bibliotelekinesis.name: Bibliotelekinesis
Bibliotelekinesis.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by an invisible, shapeless, magical force that can perform simple tasks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s command.

This force has a Strength equal to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Strength, and it can interact with objects up to 15 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this force to perform simple tasks that a Small humanoid with two hands could do, such as opening a door, moving a bookshelf’s ladder, picking up and organizing books, and similar tasks.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use this force to make attacks or wield a weapon or shield.

Jagged Hide.name: Jagged Hide
Jagged Hide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature grappling it.

Carnivorous Compulsion.name: Carnivorous Compulsion
Carnivorous Compulsion.description: At the start of each of its turns, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see an incapacitated creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or spend its next turn moving toward and attacking that creature.

C9tCUzdDve8lBel7.name: 传送
C9tCUzdDve8lBel7.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

Elemental Demise.name: 元素消亡
Elemental Demise.description: When an [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, its body disintegrates into a swirling spray of coarse sand, leaving behind only equipment it was wearing or carrying.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description:
One Humanoid the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s verbal commands.

If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Charm for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: The target is magically charmed for 1 day.

Life Path.name: Life Path
Life Path.description: Regardless of the form it takes, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make a map on its surface (no action required) that shows the route it has traveled since it left its parent mimic. The map shows terrain features and landmarks of where it has been, but doesn’t show the names of those places.

Toxic Smoke.name: Toxic Smoke
Toxic Smoke.description:
