If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes fire damage, each creature within 10 feet of it must make a [[/save format=long]] as its venom-soaked wraps emit a poisonous smoke.

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

The smoke fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] centered on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

A creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Bladed Fist.name: Bladed Fist
Bladed Fist.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Foundry Note

The Infused Arsenal reaction includes a feature where, if the reaver absorbs a nonmagical melee weapon, the Bladed Fist attack gains an additional 1d4 damage of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing type for 1 minute.

There is an enchantment activity representing each damage type:

  1. Click on the damage type of the absorbed melee weapon. The title of the enchantment will change to “Disable Infused Weapon.”

  2. Text is added to the feature's title and the attack activity to visually indicate that the Bladed Fist is infused.

  3. The enchantment lasts for 1 minute, or you can click “Disable Infused Weapon” to revert the feature to its default state. Note that you can only use one enchantment at a time.

Angelic Weapons.name: Angelic Weapons
Angelic Weapons.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s attacks are magical. When the buraq hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Grave Goods Sense.name: Grave Goods Sense
Grave Goods Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of creatures wearing or carrying one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s personal items or grave goods within 60 feet of it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can sense the general direction of its personal items and grave goods within 1 mile of it.

Turn Resistance.name: Turn Resistance
Turn Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

Swirling Bones.name: Swirling Bones
Swirling Bones.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] ft., one creature in the swarm’s space. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=VIXhfn3s9Fz7ia7z]] damage (the swarm’s choice) if the swarm has half of its hp or fewer.

Relentless Advance.name: 不息进军
Relentless Advance.description: Moving through &Reference[difficult terrain] doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across the surface of water as if it were harmless, solid ground.

Savage Hunger.name: Savage Hunger
Savage Hunger.description: Its [[/item Bite]] attack is a critical hit if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] bites a creature it has surprised.

Clurichaun’s Luck.name: Clurichaun’s Luck
Clurichaun’s Luck.description: While the clurichaun is conscious and wearing no armor and wielding no shield, it adds its Charisma modifier to its AC (included in the stat sheet).

Adhesive.name: Adhesive
Adhesive.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adheres to anything that touches it.

A creature adhered to the dune mimic is also &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} by it (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can harden its outer surface, so only the creatures it chooses are affected by this trait.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: A creature adhered to the dune mimic is also &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}.

Burrowed Tunnels.name: Burrowed Tunnels
Burrowed Tunnels.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] burrows at half its burrowing speed, it can leave a 5-foot diameter tunnel in its wake.

Sweet Song.name: Sweet Song
Sweet Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a sweet melody.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her that can hear the song must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Sweet Song for the next 24 hours.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description:
The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Speak with Insects.name: Speak with Insects
Speak with Insects.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with insects as if they shared a language.

Sinuous Strikeback.name: Sinuous Strikeback
Sinuous Strikeback.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gets two extra reactions that can be used only for &Reference[opportunity attacks].

Shadow-Stealing Ray.name: Shadow-Stealing Ray
Shadow-Stealing Ray.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a beam from its single eye at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and its shadow becomes a creature under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control for 24 hours or until the shadow is reduced to 0 hp.

On a success, the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its shadow isn’t stolen.

Each controlled shadow uses the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.QGcQYZbVl4bWzi4E]{shadow}, except it can’t create shadows from killing Humanoids.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than five shadows under its control at a time. The shadow becomes permanently under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control if the shadow’s original owner dies.

If a shadow’s original owner died within the past minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can command (no action required) the shadow to inhabit and control the body, using the owner’s statistics, proficiencies, and class features.

A shadow inhabiting a body in this way can’t cast spells or activate magic items the owner possessed, and it loses its Amorphous, Shadow Stealth, and Sunlight Weakness traits while inhabiting the body.

The shadow can inhabit or exit the body as a bonus action.

The shadow can inhabit the body for up to 24 hours after the creature died, after which time it is ejected and can’t inhabit the body again.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or its shadow is returned to it, the creature is immune to the Shadow-Stealing Ray of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] demons for the next 24 hours.

Too Big To Notice.name: Too Big To Notice
Too Big To Notice.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless in nonmagical, natural terrain, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Prophetic Caw.name: Prophetic Caw
Prophetic Caw.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] caws a prophecy that sounds different to each listener.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it must make a [[/save format=long]]. Ravenfolk have advantage on the saving throw.

On a failure, a creature hears a prophecy of its doom and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature hears a prophecy of its greatness and has advantage on the first attack roll it makes on each of its turns for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) for prophecy of its greatness that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the above activity.

Prophecy of its Greatness.name: Prophecy of its Greatness
Prophecy of its Greatness.description: The target has advantage on the first attack roll it makes on each of its turns for 1 minute.

Draining Kiss.name: Draining Kiss
Draining Kiss.description:
One creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that she is grappling must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage, and its Strength is reduced by [[/r 1d6]].

On a success, the target takes half the damage, and its Strength isn’t reduced.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0.

Silencing Squawk.name: Silencing Squawk
Silencing Squawk.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] lets out a magical squawk in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[deafened apply=false]{deafened} and unable to speak for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Deafened.name: 耳聋
Deafened.description: The target is &Reference[deafened apply=false]{deafened} and unable to speak for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bite (Swallow).name: Bite (Swallow)
Bite (Swallow).description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be swallowed.

A swallowed creature is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it takes [[/damage average activity=Gk0xFFX64t2C5Phb]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=6Pgc1TZ8czGjlaWM]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=1whREHQWZLOfCQ9Z]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by her and can escape from the corpse by using [[lookup @range.value activity=1whREHQWZLOfCQ9Z]] feet of movement, exiting &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Save: 20+ Damage.name: Save: 20+ Damage
Save: 20+ Damage.condition: If the {CREATURE} takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature

Escape Corpse.name: 逃离尸体
Escape Corpse.condition: Must use 10 feet of movement to escape

Swallowed.name: 吞下
Swallowed.description: A swallowed creature is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the nightgarm.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: A swallowed creature escaping the stomach of the nightgarm lands &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Sting.name: 蛰刺
Sting.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

The target must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity100]], taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Tormenting Gaze.name: Tormenting Gaze
Tormenting Gaze.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft. , one creature. Hit: 21 ([[/r 4d8 + 3]]) psychic damage.

Wick-Powered.name: Wick-Powered
Wick-Powered.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is inactive and unconscious while its wick is unlit.

When its wick is lit, it obeys the commands of the creature that lit the wick, and it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hp maximum is reduced by 2 ([[/r 1d4]]) for every 24 hours it remains lit and active, and no effect short of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell can remove this reduction. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies when its hp maximum is reduced to 0.

A creature grappling the active [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take its action to extinguish the wick by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

A creature within 5 feet of a [[lookup @name lowercase]] that is dormant from an unlit wick can take an action to light the wick, gaining command of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Baleful Glare.name: Baleful Glare
Baleful Glare.description:
When a creature that can see the eyes of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s severed head starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force it to make a [[/save format=long]] if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature.

On a failed save, the creature is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the start of its next turn.

While frightened in this way, the creature must take the &Reference[Dash] action and move away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the safest available route.

A doomed creature that fails this saving throw is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} while frightened instead.

Unless &Reference[surprise]{surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can’t see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the start of its next turn.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: A doomed creature that fails this saving throw is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} while frightened instead.

Embrace Darkness (Shadow Form Only).name: Embrace Darkness (Shadow Form Only)
Embrace Darkness (Shadow Form Only).description: Melee Spell Attack: [[/attack]], reach 0 ft., one creature in the herald’s space [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: The target is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

Create Specter.name: 生成恶灵
Create Specter.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently.

The target’s spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.PuPo4H4Dcxigf0fY]{specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. This specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than twelve specters under its control at one time.

Void Thrum.name: Void Thrum
Void Thrum.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a barely audible, vibrating thrum laced with Void energy.

Each creature within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Terrifying Yowl.name: Terrifying Yowl
Terrifying Yowl.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits an ear-piercing yowl.

Each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear the yowl must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) thunder damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Summon Demon.name: 召唤恶魔
Summon Demon.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 1d4]] apes that are Fiends with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s damage resistances and immunities.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<=50#A apau perape is called on a result of 1 instead]]{50 percent chance} of calling one apau perap instead. The called creatures arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its telepathic commands.

The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Chance Apau Perape is Called.name: Chance Apau Perape is Called
Chance Apau Perape is Called.chatFlavor: A apau perape is called on a result of 1 instead

Spirited Charge.name: Spirited Charge
Spirited Charge.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while mounted and then hits with a Lance attack on the same turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use a bonus action to command its mount to make one melee weapon attack against that creature as a reaction.

Reality Bomb.name: Reality Bomb
Reality Bomb.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] summons and throws a tiny rune of law at a point it can see within 100 feet. The rune explodes on impact.

Each creature within 30 feet of where the rune landed must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t stunned.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Spread Poison.name: Spread Poison
Spread Poison.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s blood briefly turns into a mist around it.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Breathless Kiss.name: Breathless Kiss
Breathless Kiss.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] draws all the air from the target’s lungs with a kiss.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has movement remaining, she drags the grappled creature into deep water, where it begins &Reference[suffocation]{suffocating}.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} and the attacking creature draws all the air from the target’s lungs with a kiss.

Apothecary.name: 药剂师
Apothecary.description:
At the start of each of the kobold [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

The alchemist has resistance to that damage type until the start of its next turn.

Acid Damage Resistance.name: Acid Damage Resistance
Acid Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to acid damage.

Cold Damage Resistance.name: Cold Damage Resistance
Cold Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to cold damage.

Fire Damage Resistance.name: Fire Damage Resistance
Fire Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to fire damage.

Lighting Damage Resistance.name: Lighting Damage Resistance
Lighting Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to lighting damage.

Poison Damage Resistance.name: 毒素伤害抗性
Poison Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to poison damage.

Icy Body.name: Icy Body
Icy Body.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) cold damage.

Magical Tunneler.name: Magical Tunneler
Magical Tunneler.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through any unworked earth and stone.

While doing so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can choose whether to leave the material it moves through undisturbed or leave a 15-foot diameter tunnel in its wake.

Prophetic Magic.name: Prophetic Magic
Prophetic Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the [[/item .XJnbqFI49WsKBoGS]]{Augury} and [[/item .Zlu9pQsupAKJdIln]]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip at will, requiring no material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability.

Infecting Telepathy.name: Infecting Telepathy
Infecting Telepathy.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the [[lookup @name lowercase]], or deals psychic damage to it, the creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become infected with the [[/item nihilethic rot]] disease.

Diseased.name: Diseased
Diseased.description:
You are infected with nihilethic rot disease.

Until this disease is cured, the creature can’t regain hp unless it is submerged in water, and it can breathe air and water.

The creature must be submerged in water at least once every 2 hours to avoid suffocating, and if it is outside a body of water, it takes damage every 10 minutes, unless moisture is applied to its skin before 10 minutes have passed.

Burning Touch.name: Burning Touch
Burning Touch.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with a [[/item Slam]] attack, the Slam deals an extra 21 (6d6) fire damage (included in the attack).

In addition, a creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits her with a melee weapon attack while within 5 feet of her takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Eternally Loyal.name: Eternally Loyal
Eternally Loyal.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on ability checks and saving throws against influence or effects that would encourage it or force it to act against its draconic master.

If charmed or controlled and directed to act against its master, the tree can immediately repeat the effect’s saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Flood Fever.name: Flood Fever
Flood Fever.description:
During flood season, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is overcome with bloodthirsty malice, becoming more aggressive and losing its proficiency in Intelligence (History) and Intelligence (Investigation) checks.

If it hasn’t fed within the past 8 hours, it enters a frenzy, spending each turn attacking the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object, with a preference for an object smaller than itself.

During the frenzy, it has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its hp.

It continues the frenzy until it has fed and enters the frenzy again every time it goes without eating for 8 hours for the duration of the flood season.

Swan Song.name: Swan Song
Swan Song.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 hp, it can use its last breath to sing a plaintive and beautiful melody.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it that can hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated appky=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

While incapacitated, the creature’s speed is reduced to 0.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated appky=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

Trampling Charge.name: Trampling Charge
Trampling Charge.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a [[/item Gore]] attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

If the target is prone, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one [[/item Stomp]] attack against it as a bonus action.

save.condition: If the Ngobou moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn

Implant Egg.name: Implant Egg
Implant Egg.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] implants an egg into an incapacitated creature within 5 feet of her that isn’t a Construct or Undead. Until the egg hatches or is removed, the creature is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}, &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed}, and doesn’t need to eat or drink.

The egg hatches after 30 days, and the larval tosculi bursts out of the host, killing the host in the process.

A creature can take its action to remove the egg by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

Alternatively, a spell or effect that cures disease disintegrates the unhatched tosculi.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: 中毒并麻痹
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: Until the egg hatches or is removed, the target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}, &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed}, and doesn’t need to eat or drink.

Grant Blood Rage.name: Grant Blood Rage
Grant Blood Rage.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] infuses reckless rage in one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it that isn’t a Construct or Undead.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be enraged for a number of rounds equal to the target’s Constitution modifier.

While enraged, the target has advantage on all melee attack rolls, and attack rolls against it have advantage.

When the rage ends, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage and suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}

A creature with any levels of exhaustion automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

Enraged.name: Enraged
Enraged.description:
The target is enraged for a number of rounds equal to the target’s Constitution modifier.

While enraged, the target has advantage on all melee attack rolls, and attack rolls against it have advantage.

Coastal Camouflage.name: Coastal Camouflage
Coastal Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy, muddy, or swampy terrain.

Void Body.name: Void Body
Void Body.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage that isn’t radiant, it can reduce the damage by [[/r 1d12]].

Medjai’s Scepter.name: Medjai’s Scepter
Medjai’s Scepter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Medjai’s Scepter]] attack.

Alchemical Dagger.name: Alchemical Dagger
Alchemical Dagger.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] of the type determined by [[/item Apothecary]].

Protective Interference.name: Protective Interference
Protective Interference.description: When a friendly creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet of it is the target of an attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can impose disadvantage on the attack roll. To do so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a [[/item Slam]] attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

save.condition: If the target is a creature

damage.condition: On a hit from a slam attack

Call Spiderlings.name: Call Spiderlings
Call Spiderlings.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases pheromones and calls 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.4udpeEneFSZK9NTB]{swarm of spiders}.

The spiders arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its pheromone commands.

The spiders remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Burning Slam.name: Burning Slam
Burning Slam.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a flammable object, it ignites.

If the target is a creature, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or ignite.

Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes [[/damage average activity=lGyEQcQv8YNDfDDp]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

Gout of Flame.name: Gout of Flame
Gout of Flame.description:
Flames erupt on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Broken Shell.name: Broken Shell
Broken Shell.description: A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Flicker.name: Flicker
Flicker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] flickers in and out of sight. Ranged weapon attacks against it are made with disadvantage.

Blow Kiss.name: Blow Kiss
Blow Kiss.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] blows a kiss at a creature charmed by it.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and the charmed condition immediately ends on it.

save.condition: The creature must be charmed by the mirager

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Burning Terror.name: Burning Terror
Burning Terror.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] assaults the mind of one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it with the painful, humiliating memory of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s first death.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, the target takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

While frightened, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=R6pQXgM9mRQY2B79]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisonous Flask.name: Poisonous Flask
Poisonous Flask.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] hastily combines alchemical substances into a poisonous concoction and throws it at a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can make a [[/save format=long activity=0gxSXJ9g5yuZdtz4]] at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description:
The target is is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature can make another saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Hundreds of Eyes.name: Hundreds of Eyes
Hundreds of Eyes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on saving throws against being blinded.

In addition, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t blinded, creatures attacking it can’t benefit from traits and features that rely on a creature’s allies distracting or surrounding the [[lookup @name lowercase]], such as the Pack Tactics trait or Sneak Attack class feature.

Spiky Hide.name: Spiky Hide
Spiky Hide.description:
A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

This trait also applies to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s walls.

Creeping Death.name: Creeping Death
Creeping Death.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a wave of necromantic energy, hastening the journey toward death.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature below half its hp maximum has disadvantage on this saving throw.

Nimbleness.name: Nimbleness
Nimbleness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through the space of any Medium or larger hostile creature, and such a space isn’t difficult terrain for the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Disintegrating Gaze.name: Disintegrating Gaze
Disintegrating Gaze.description:
One creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be transformed into a misty cloud for 1 minute.

The transformed creature’s only method of movement is a flying speed of 10 feet, and it can enter and occupy the space of another creature. In addition, the transformed target can’t talk, attack, cast spells, or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with.

The transformed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking [[/damage average average=FOO]] damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

A creature killed by this effect can be restored to life only by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qLeEXZDbW5y4bmLY]{true resurrection} or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell.

Transformed.name: Transformed
Transformed.description:
The target is transformed into a misty cloud for 1 minute.

The transformed target can’t talk, attack, cast spells, or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with.

Keen Hearing.name: 敏锐听觉
Keen Hearing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Alchemical Flame Jet.name: Alchemical Flame Jet
Alchemical Flame Jet.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spews a jet of alchemical fire in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]] that is [[lookup @target.template.width activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet wide.

Each creature in the line must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Boar Spear.name: Boar Spear
Boar Spear.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft. , one target. Hit: 16 ([[/r 2d10 + 5]]) piercing damage.

Hardy.name: Hardy
Hardy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against poison.

Rumbling Bellow.name: Rumbling Bellow
Rumbling Bellow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a deep bellow that vibrates within the bodies of those nearby.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If a creature poisoned by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Toxic Skin]] fails this saving throw, it is also &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn as the combined vibrations and hallucinations disorient it.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

Cursed Existence.name: Cursed Existence
Cursed Existence.description:
When it drops to 0 hp in desert terrain, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body disintegrates into sand and a parched breeze.

However, unless it was killed in a hallowed location, with radiant damage, or by a creature under the effects of the bless spell, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms at the next sundown [[/r 1d100]] miles away from where it died in a random direction.

Carrion Breath.name: Carrion Breath
Carrion Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales rotting breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

While poisoned in this way, a creature has disadvantage on death saving throws.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The Active Effect (AE) for the poisoned condition includes disadvantage on death saving throws.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature has disadvantage on death saving throws.

Frost Breath.name: Frost Breath
Frost Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales frost in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Diseased.name: Diseased
Diseased.description:
You are infected with nihilethic rot disease.

Until this disease is cured, the creature can’t regain hp unless it is submerged in water, and it can breathe air and water.

The creature must be submerged in water at least once every 2 hours to avoid suffocating, and if it is outside a body of water, it takes damage every 10 minutes, unless moisture is applied to its skin before 10 minutes have passed.

Snow Step.name: Snow Step
Snow Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space she can see. The origin and destination spaces must contain snow or ice.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Poisoned Gifts.name: Poisoned Gifts
Poisoned Gifts.description:
A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 1 minute stirring one of its red claws in a drink or cooked meal, contaminating the food or drink.

A creature that eats or drinks the contaminated food or drink must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 hour.

A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is also &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} while poisoned in this way.

The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is also &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} while poisoned in this way.

Shape Swarm.name: Shape Swarm
Shape Swarm.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can shape itself into a Small Humanoid or back into a shapeless form of Tiny bones.

Its statistics are the same in each form, and it can’t regain hp or gain temporary hp. It can’t take on a Humanoid form if it is occupying the space of another creature.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal {ITEM}.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

Desert Walk.name: Desert Walk
Desert Walk.description: &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of sand or gravel doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Explosive Infernal Power Source.name: Explosive Infernal Power Source
Explosive Infernal Power Source.description:
When a [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, its infernal battery explodes.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

Necrotic Weapons.name: Necrotic Weapons
Necrotic Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 necrotic damage (included in the attack).

Sand Camouflage.name: Sand Camouflage
Sand Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

Timeless Nature.name: Timeless Nature
Timeless Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t age and doesn’t require food, drink, or sleep.

Swingline.name: Swingline
Swingline.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a length of webbing at a point on a surface, such as the ground or wall, it can see within 30 feet of it, attaching one end of the webbing to that point. It then reels in the webbing, pulling itself to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of that point.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in this way, &Reference[opportunity attacks] against it have disadvantage.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulled itself at least 15 feet straight toward a creature, it has advantage on the next [[/item Bite]] attack it makes against that creature before the start of its next turn.

Mordant Puppets.name: Mordant Puppets
Mordant Puppets.description:
A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 8 hours draining a dead Humanoid of its fluids and internal organs, replacing them with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s acid and filaments. The Humanoid’s body then becomes a puppet controlled by the snare.

Mordant puppets share a telepathic link with the snare, and each puppet uses the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{zombie}.

The puppets can’t move more than 30 feet away from the snare. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than twelve puppets under its control at one time.

When a puppet is destroyed, each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the puppet must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, all puppets it controls immediately crumble into desiccated husks as the animating acid and filaments leave them.

Blessed Weapons.name: Blessed Weapons
Blessed Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapons are blessed by its deity, and its weapon attacks are magical.

When the cult leader hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Waking Dreams.name: Waking Dreams
Waking Dreams.description:
Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute.

When it moves, an incapacitated creature moves in a random direction.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t incapacitated.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description:
The target is is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Withered Tresses.name: Withered Tresses
Withered Tresses.description: If a [[lookup @name lowercase]] is kept out of water for 24 consecutive hours, its hair and body dry into desiccated swamp weeds and the creature is utterly destroyed.

Mithral Scales.name: Mithral Scales
Mithral Scales.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] succeeds on a saving throw by 5 or more against a spell that targets only it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected, and the spell is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], turning the caster into the target.

Bind Fates.name: Bind Fates
Bind Fates.description:
One creature within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or the target’s fate is bound to one of its ally’s (chosen at random).

Any damage or condition the target suffers is inflicted on the individual to which they are bound instead, and vice versa.

A creature can be bound to only one other creature at a time.

This binding lasts until lifted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qcYitWoSMTnKkzM1]{heal} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y]{heroes’ feast} spell or similar magic.

Paralyzing Gaze.name: Paralyzing Gaze
Paralyzing Gaze.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] turns its eerie gaze upon one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the urochar’s Paralyzing Gaze for the next 24 hours.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description:
The target is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Forest and Urban Hunter.name: Forest and Urban Hunter
Forest and Urban Hunter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks to find and track Beasts and Humanoids.

Master of Undeath.name: Master of Undeath
Master of Undeath.description:
A Humanoid killed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s disease rises [[/r 1d4]] hours later as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.nU8GN8La8DCt8SDb]{skeleton} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{zombie} (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice), unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed.

Between its disease and its Animating Worms, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than fifteen total skeletons and zombies under its control at one time.

Undead Rises.name: Undead Rises
Undead Rises.condition: If a humanoid is killed from disease

affects.special: A humanoid killed by the attacking creature's disease

Haboob.name: Haboob
Haboob.description:
A 30-foot-tall cylinder of sand forms in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and moves with it for 10 minutes, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends the storm as a bonus action, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

The area within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is heavily obscured.

A creature that starts its turn in that area or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by the storm.

While restrained, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and moves with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves.

A creature, including the restrained creature, can use its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]]

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by the storm. The target can its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

Seduce the Righteous.name: Seduce the Righteous
Seduce the Righteous.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] corrupts one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, or saving throws (the idolic deity’s choice) until the end of its next turn.

Creatures that wield divine or celestial power, such as clerics, paladins, or aasimars, have disadvantage on the saving throw.

Foundry Note

Active Effects (AE) are available to apply disadvantage on ability checks or saving throws to the target. An AE is not available to apply disadvanage to attack rolls.

Disadv. Ability Checks.name: Disadv. Ability Checks
Disadv. Ability Checks.description: The target has disadvantage on ability checks.

Disadv. Saving Throws.name: Disadv. Saving Throws
Disadv. Saving Throws.description: The target has disadvantage on saving throws.

Woodland Stride.name: Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: &Reference[Difficult terrain] composed of magical or nonmagical plants doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Tree Stride.name: 树跃术
Tree Stride.description: Once on her turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one dead tree within her reach and emerge from a second dead tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

Tomb Rot.name: Tomb Rot
Tomb Rot.description:
A creature infested with this disease manifests symptoms [[/r 1d4]] days after infection, which include muscle weakness and rotten-smelling breath as its body rots from the inside out.

Until the disease is cured, at the end of each long rest, the infected creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and suffer one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}. This exhaustion lasts until the creature finishes a long rest after the disease is cured.

A creature that succeeds on two saving throws recovers from the disease.

save.condition: 长休

range.special: A creature infested with this disease

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: The target suffer one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Song of the Forest.name: Song of the Forest
Song of the Forest.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings one of the following songs at up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it.

Each target that can hear the song must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or suffer the song’s effect.

  • Ancient Lullaby. Each creature that fails the saving throw falls &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute. The unconscious creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

  • Fascinating Melody. Each creature that fails the saving throw is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

  • Luckless Tune. Each creature that fails the saving throw has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) for Luckless Tune to configure disadvantage on ability checks. But this AE does not automate disadvantage on attack rolls.

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: The target falls &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute. The unconscious creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: 劣势：攻击和检定
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Ride The Bolt.name: Ride The Bolt
Ride The Bolt.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can travel instantly along any bolt of lightning.

When a bolt of lightning strikes or an effect deals lightning damage within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it can teleport to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of where the lightning struck or dealt damage.

utility.condition: When a bolt of lightning strikes or an effect deals lightning damage within 30 feet of the gremlin

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Grasping Claw]] attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends.

While swallowed, the target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=uygphpszavIkHznS]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using [[lookup @range.value activity=uygphpszavIkHznS]] feet of movement, exiting &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Save: 30+ Damage.name: Save: 30+ Damage
Save: 30+ Damage.condition: If the {CREATURE} takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature

Damage: While Swallowed.name: Damage: While Swallowed
Damage: While Swallowed.condition: If a creature is swallowed by the gug

Escape Corpse.name: 逃离尸体
Escape Corpse.condition: Must use 10 feet of movement to escape

Swallowed.name: 吞下
Swallowed.description: While swallowed, the target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the creature.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: A swallowed creature escaping the stomach lands &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Deathly Spores.name: Deathly Spores
Deathly Spores.description:
When a [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, its body crumbles into millions of spores.

Each creature within 10 feet of the mi-go must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Ancestral Wrath.name: Ancestral Wrath
Ancestral Wrath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] immediately recognizes any individual descended from its tribe. It has advantage on attack rolls against such creatures, and those creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s traits and attacks.

Icy Weapons.name: Icy Weapons
Icy Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 cold damage (included in the attack).

Zombie Drop.name: Zombie Drop
Zombie Drop.description:
At the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, it can choose to have one corpse fall from it and immediately rise as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{zombie} under its control.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than ten zombies under its control at one time.

Zombies take their turns immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Seal the Doom.name: Seal the Doom
Seal the Doom.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] points at a creature doomed by [[/item Deathly Doom]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it that it can see.

The creature must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target immediately drops to 0 hp if it is below half its hp maximum.

On a success, the target is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Seal the Doom for the next 24 hours.

Chilling Presence.name: Chilling Presence
Chilling Presence.description:
A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage.

Unprotected, nonmagical flames within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are extinguished, and water freezes if it remains within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the maiden for at least 1 minute.

Serpentine Armlets.name: Serpentine Armlets
Serpentine Armlets.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] commands its armlets to drop to the floor and transform into two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.ZW39DE2zI3TXVYC9]{giant poisonous snakes}.

The snakes act as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obey its spoken commands.

The snakes remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses one or both of them as a bonus action.

When the snakes disappear, they become wisps of smoke and reform as armlets around the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s arms.

Distracting Babble.name: Distracting Babble
Distracting Babble.description:
When a spellcaster that is concentrating on a spell starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the spellcaster must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or lose concentration on the spell.

In addition, if a spellcaster within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts a spell, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or the spell fails to cast, using the action, bonus action, or reaction to cast the spell but not expending the spell slot.

Darkness Shroud.name: Darkness Shroud
Darkness Shroud.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] naturally suppresses light near it. Bright light within 30 feet of the dragon becomes dim light, and dim light within 30 feet becomes nonmagical darkness.

If this shroud overlaps bright light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] whirls its greatsword in a great arc.

Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Grasping Limbs (Humanoid Form Only).name: Grasping Limbs (Humanoid Form Only)
Grasping Limbs (Humanoid Form Only).description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] can wield weapons and hold, grasp, push, pull, or interact with objects that might otherwise require a more Humanoid form to accomplish.

Speak with Beasts and Plants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
Speak with Beasts and Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

Bawdy Remark.name: Bawdy Remark
Bawdy Remark.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn as it doubles over in laughter or freezes up in embarrassment (the target’s choice).

save.condition: On a hit

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn as it doubles over in laughter or freezes up in embarrassment.

Massive Bulk.name: Massive Bulk
Massive Bulk.description:
A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take the Dash action.

In addition, a creature attempting to grapple, push, or knock the [[lookup @name lowercase]] prone has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks to do so.

Vermin Encasement.name: Vermin Encasement
Vermin Encasement.description:
The creature within the vermin’s shell is a shapeless ooze protected by the vermin’s exoskeleton.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 hp, the exoskeleton breaks, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ooze exits it.

Once out of its [[lookup @name lowercase]], the ooze is Small, has an AC of 10, 10 hp, and a speed of 15 feet, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

In addition, its only attack is a Slam that uses the same statistics as its [[/item Sting]], except it deals bludgeoning damage instead of piercing damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it remains outside of a host for more than 24 hours. It can exit or enter a dead host’s exoskeleton as a bonus action.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has membranes between its fore and hind limbs that expand when falling to slow its rate of descent to 60 feet per round, landing on its feet and taking no falling damage.

It can move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it falls.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t gain height with its gliding membranes alone. If subjected to a strong wind or lift of any kind, it can use the updraft to glide farther.

Shadow Jump.name: 阴影跳跃
Shadow Jump.description: While in shadows, dim light, or darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears into the darkness and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Sand Form.name: Sand Form
Sand Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Hidden Step.name: Hidden Step
Hidden Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space she can see and takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Aura of Valor.name: Aura of Valor
Aura of Valor.description:
Friendly creatures wielding weapons within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have advantage on weapon attack rolls and ability checks.

At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can choose to exclude any number of friendly creatures from this aura (no action required).

Healing Purr.name: Healing Purr
Healing Purr.description: The kot bayun purrs at a creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it. The target magically regains [[/heal average]] and is freed from any disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

Defensive Recoil.name: Defensive Recoil
Defensive Recoil.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage, it can make one [[/item Slam]] attack against a creature restrained by it.

Unmaking.name: Unmaking
Unmaking.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s speed and its slim, sharp blade can slice cloth, leather, and paper into scraps very quickly.

Whenever a [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Trimming Blade]] attack roll exceeds the target’s Armor Class by 5 or more, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or one nonmagical cloth, leather, or paper object on the target becomes damaged and unusable until repaired.

This effect can deface or ruin clothing, backpacks, journals, and similar objects, but it can’t destroy armor.

Eerie Howl.name: Eerie Howl
Eerie Howl.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases an eerie howl that fades in and out and echoes strangely.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Eerie Howl for the next 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Jolting Touch.name: Jolting Touch
Jolting Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

Movement -10 ft..name: Movement -10 ft.
Movement -10 ft..description: The target’s speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

Ward Bond.name: Ward Bond
Ward Bond.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] forms a magical bond with a willing creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

While bonded, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its ward know the distance and direction to each other and the general state of each other’s health, even if the two are on different planes of existence.

The bond lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or its ward dies, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends it as a bonus action, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses this bonus action to create a bond with another creature.

Aura of Drunkenness.name: Aura of Drunkenness
Aura of Drunkenness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] radiates an aura of drunkenness to a radius of [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet.

Each creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 hour.

A creature that has consumed alcohol within the past hour has disadvantage on the saving throw.

While poisoned, a creature falls @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.w7eitkpD7QQTB6j0.JournalEntryPage.y0TkcdyoZlOTmAFT]{prone} if it tries to move more than half its speed during a turn.

A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Aura of Drunkenness for 24 hours.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Burning Belly.name: Burning Belly
Burning Belly.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Slam]] attack against a target it is grappling as it shoves the creature into its open, flame-filled belly.

If the attack hits, the target is forced into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s burning belly, and the grapple ends.

While inside the belly, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, has &Reference[three-quarters cover] against attacks and other effects outside the belly, and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

A creature, including the target, can take its action to pull the target free from the belly by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]]. The creature making the attempt takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Escape the Belly.name: Escape the Belly
Escape the Belly.condition: If a creature is inside the belly of the attacking creature

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description:
If the attack hits, the target is forced into the burning belly, and the grapple ends.

While inside the belly, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, has &Reference[three-quarters cover] against attacks and other effects outside the belly,

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically polymorphs into a Medium female Humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying transforms with her. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

Wall Smash.name: Wall Smash
Wall Smash.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has its wall set up (see Emplace Wall), it can briefly close the panels of the wall in on each other.

Each creature other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]] between the panels in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]] from the corner where the panels meet must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Scorpion’s Blessing.name: Scorpion’s Blessing
Scorpion’s Blessing.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against poison.

In addition, when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d4 poison damage (included in the attack).

Single-Minded Purpose.name: Single-Minded Purpose
Single-Minded Purpose.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against fiends and creatures wielding fiendish power, such as tieflings or some sorcerers and warlocks.

Majesty of the Abyss.name: Majesty of the Abyss
Majesty of the Abyss.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a sinister burst of infernal power.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can see it must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t blinded.

A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more is also &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description:
The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: The target is also &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

Water Susceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
Water Susceptibility.description:
For every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

Foundry Note

Scaling for the Damage activity is available, with each scaling value corresponding to 5 feet of movement. For example, a value of 1 represents 5 feet, 2 represents 10 feet, and so on.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

To do so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available to activate the AC bonus on the Effects tab of the character sheet.

utility.condition: When hit by a melee attack

Dazing Breath.name: Dazing Breath
Dazing Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales sweet-smelling gas in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute.

While incapacitated, the creature is indifferent about creatures that it is hostile toward within 50 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

If the creature is attacked, harmed by a spell, or witnesses any of its allies being harmed, it is no longer indifferent but remains incapacitated.

The incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[incapacitated appy=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute and feels indifferent about creatures that it is hostile toward within 50 feet of the drake.

The incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Elusive.name: 飘忽不定
Elusive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or escape an effect that would reduce its speed or grapple or restrain it.

Book Safekeeper.name: Book Safekeeper
Book Safekeeper.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body contains a small, extradimensional space. This space can hold up to 100 pounds of Small or smaller objects.

This space can hold only books, scrolls, parchment, or other written works on paper or other paper- or wood-like materials.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is the only creature capable of retrieving items from this space while it is alive.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, the objects within its extradimensional space are ejected into an unoccupied space nearest it.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
Up to two creatures the &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or the &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn moves the creature up to 30 feet in any direction (including upward).

A moved target is then &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Diseased Ichor.name: Diseased Ichor
Diseased Ichor.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes piercing damage or slashing damage, a spray of caustic blood spurts from the wound.

Each creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become infected with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s ichor disease and be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the disease is cured.

Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hp maximum by 5 ([[/r 2d4]]) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success.

This reduction lasts until the disease is cured.

The creature dies if the disease reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Antimagic Susceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
Antimagic Susceptibility.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} while in the area of an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Eon0jzGzQRNluTPQ]{antimagic field}.

If targeted by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{dispel magic}, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster’s spell save DC or fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} while in the area of an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Eon0jzGzQRNluTPQ]{antimagic field}.

Snowy Engulf.name: Snowy Engulf
Snowy Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it.

The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, and it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] 's turns or take [[/damage average]] damage.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

Ravenous Larva.name: Ravenous Larva
Ravenous Larva.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make an &Reference[opportunity attacks]{opportunity attack} against any creature that leaves its reach, even if the creature takes the &Reference[Disengage] action.

In addition, it has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its hp.

Fate-Altering Stinger.name: Fate-Altering Stinger
Fate-Altering Stinger.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have its fate corrupted.

A creature with corrupted fate has disadvantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws, can’t be targeted by any &Reference[divination] magic, can’t be perceived through magical scrying sensors, and is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts.

The target’s fate can be restored, ending the corruption and breaking the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s magical tie to the target, by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]{dispel evil and good spell} or similar magic.

Fate-Altering Stinger.name: Fate-Altering Stinger
