Fate-Altering Stinger.description: A creature with corrupted fate has disadvantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws, can’t be targeted by any &Reference[divination] magic, can’t be perceived through magical scrying sensors, and is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts.

Defensive Zone.name: Defensive Zone
Defensive Zone.description: When a creature enters the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s reach, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Greatsword]] attack against the creature.

Frenzy.name: 狂怒
Frenzy.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] triggers a berserk frenzy that lasts 1 minute.

While in frenzy, it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and has advantage on attack rolls.

Attack rolls made against a frenzied [[lookup @name lowercase]] have advantage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that adds the damage resistances described above. However, there is currently no automation to apply advantage to attack rolls at this time.

Frenzy.name: 狂怒
Frenzy.description: While in frenzy, it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and has advantage on attack rolls.

Distortion.name: Distortion
Distortion.description: Ranged attacks against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are made with disadvantage.

Enfeebling Attacks.name: Enfeebling Attacks
Enfeebling Attacks.description:
Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals necrotic damage to a creature that is below half its hp maximum, the target’s Strength score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]].

The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0.

Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

affects.special: Creature that is below half its hp maximum

Shadow Rift.name: Shadow Rift
Shadow Rift.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a shadowy rift on a point she can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet.

Each creature within the [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the rift must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by wisps of icy shadow for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t restrained.

A restrained creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by wisps of icy shadow for 1 minute.

A restrained creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Tail Whip.name: 尾鞭击打
Tail Whip.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] whips its tail around itself.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray
Acid Spray.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sprays acid on one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it, creating a puddle of oil beneath the creature.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn’t knocked prone.

The slippery oil covers the ground in a 5-foot square centered on the point where the target was standing for 1 minute.

A creature that enters the oily area or ends its turn there must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=Sba913UyIFWIj8yJ]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

range.special: Point the target was standing for 1 minute

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] draws the moisture from containers and creatures around it.

Nonmagical water and other liquids within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that aren’t being worn or carried turn to dust.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that isn’t a Construct or Undead must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and up to 5 gallons of nonmagical liquid it is wearing or carrying turn to dust.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage, and nonmagical liquids it is wearing or carrying don’t turn to dust.

Plants, Oozes, creatures with the Amphibious or Water Breathing trait, and creatures made mostly of water, such as water elementals or steam mephitis, have disadvantage on the saving throw.

Fate’s Step.name: Fate’s Step
Fate’s Step.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

A tiny hourglass shatters into a swirl of sand at the origin and destination when it uses this bonus action.

Echolocation.name: Echolocation
Echolocation.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

Speak with Felines.name: Speak with Felines
Speak with Felines.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with felines as if they shared a language.

Death Sense.name: Death Sense
Death Sense.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint, by scent, the location of each creature below half its hp maximum within 60 feet of it, and it can sense the general direction of creatures that don’t have all of their hp within 1 mile of it.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can foretell the age and manner of a creature’s death by looking at it. This effect doesn’t take into account possible circumstances that might change the outcome, such as the casting of powerful spells or the creature making a radical change in its life’s path.

Psychic Absorption.name: Psychic Absorption
Psychic Absorption.description: Whenever the star spawn is subjected to psychic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hp equal to the psychic damage dealt.

Phrenic Weapons.name: Phrenic Weapons
Phrenic Weapons.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d6 psychic damage (included in the attack).

Unearthly Grace.name: Unearthly Grace
Unearthly Grace.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Charisma modifier is added to its armor class (included in sheet AC).

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect in the Effects tab that applies disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls at this time.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[difficult terrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

Deafening Voice.name: Deafening Voice
Deafening Voice.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] speaks a lilting incantation.

Each creature within 30 feet of her and that can hear her voice must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[deafened apply=false]{deafened} for 1 hour.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage, isn’t deafened, and is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Deafening Voice for the next 24 hours.

Construct Nature.name: Construct Nature
Construct Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Lotus Scent.name: Lotus Scent
Lotus Scent.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] secretes an oily chemical that most creatures find intoxicating.

Each creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the dream eater must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

While poisoned, the creature is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} by the [[lookup @details.type.value]].

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Lotus Scent for the next 24 hours.

Poisoned & Charmed.name: 中毒并魅惑
Poisoned & Charmed.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

While poisoned, the creature is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} as well.

Spines.name: Spines
Spines.description:
A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

In addition, a creature grappled by or grappling the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn.

damage.condition: A creature grappled by or grappling the erina

Voice of the Deeps.name: Voice of the Deeps
Voice of the Deeps.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 5 minutes giving a speech in a rolling, droning voice that fascinates listeners.

At the end of the speech, each creature that heard it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or forget the events of the past 10 minutes or keep no memory of the events of the next 5 minutes (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

On a successful saving throw, a creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Voice of the Deeps for the next 24 hours.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead.

Fold.name: Fold
Fold.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fold and reshape its papery body to change its size between Tiny, Small, and Medium.

It can also use this bonus action to fold itself into the shape of a book, which doesn’t have wings, or back into its Small form.

Without wings, it loses its flying speed. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are the same in each form. It reverts to its Small form if it dies.

Mounted Warrior.name: Mounted Warrior
Mounted Warrior.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is rarely seen without its warhorse mount.

The warhorse wears custom barding that raises is Armor Class to 15, and mounting and dismounting the warhorse costs the [[lookup @name lowercase]] only 5 feet of movement.

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is mounted, its mount can’t be charmed or frightened.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) will be attached to the summoned warhorse, but it will initially be disabled. After placing the summoned creature on the scene, navigate to its Effects tab in the character sheet and enable the "Barding AC 15" AE. Enabling this effect will update the creature's statistics as described above.

There is another AE on the Mounted Warrior activity that can be applied to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while mounted, adding the Frightened condition to the character sheet.

Charmed/Frightened CI.name: Charmed/Frightened CI
Charmed/Frightened CI.description: While the ghost knight is mounted, its mount can’t be charmed or frightened.

Fortified Shell.name: Fortified Shell
Fortified Shell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores any attack against its shell that doesn’t do 30 points of damage or more. Attacking the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s head or flippers bypasses this trait.

Healing Oil.name: Healing Oil
Healing Oil.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] applies healing oil to a creature it can see within 5 feet of it.

The target magically regains [[/heal average]] and is freed from any disease or poison.

The target must then succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its speed is halved and it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws for 1 minute.

Throw Stone.name: Throw Stone
Throw Stone.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is at least 10 feet below the moss lurker, such as at the base of a cliff where the moss lurker stands, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take 1d4 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the rock fell before hitting the target, to a maximum of 10d4.

Foundry Note

Scaling for the Save activity is available to configure damage, with each scaling value corresponding to 5 feet of movement. For example, a value of 1 represents 10 feet, 2 represents 20 feet, and so on to a maximum of 100 feet.

Sweet Water.name: Sweet Water
Sweet Water.description:
A creature that drinks water from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s pitcher regains [[/heal average]], reduces its exhaustion level by 1, and must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 10 minutes.

An unconscious creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Drinking the water provides a creature enough nourishment to sustain it for one day.

Grasping Whirlpool.name: Grasping Whirlpool
Grasping Whirlpool.description:
The [[lookup @name]] magically creates a swirling vortex of water centered on a point he can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet. The vortex appears in the shape of a cylinder that is [[lookup @target.template.height activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet tall with a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot radius.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}

On a success, a creature takes half the damage, isn’t restrained, and can choose to be pushed out of the whirlpool’s space.

A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

While restrained, a creature is unable to breathe unless it can breathe water, and it must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=3VHvaYH0exqHgOvI]] at the end of each of its turns or take [[/damage average activity=3VHvaYH0exqHgOvI]] damage.

A creature, including the restrained creature, can take an action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

A creature with a swimming speed has advantage on the saving throw and on the Strength check to escape.

affects.special: A creature, including the restrained creature

Scouring Sirocco.name: Scouring Sirocco
Scouring Sirocco.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] generates a blast of hot wind and sand in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t blinded.

A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The area is heavily obscured by airborne sand until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Enclose.name: Enclose
Enclose.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] encloses a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it in a mossy growth on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body, and the grapple ends.

While enclosed in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s growth, the target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] from attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature enclosed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside its growth, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the end of that turn or expel the enclosed creature as the growth bursts.

The expelled creature falls @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.w7eitkpD7QQTB6j0.JournalEntryPage.y0TkcdyoZlOTmAFT]{prone} in a space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, an enclosed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the growth by using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Blinded & Restrained.name: 目盲并束缚
Blinded & Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] from attacks and other effects outside the attacking creature.

Forest Protectors.name: Forest Protectors
Forest Protectors.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 1d4]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.UR2gWLFHmFwG7ReH]{awakened trees} or @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.OoOuG21mjJohDX3c]{tendril puppets}, or it calls 1 Plant with a challenge rating of 4 or lower.

The called creatures arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the vine lord and obeying its spoken commands.

The Plants remain for 1 hour, until the vine lord dies, or until the vine lord dismisses them as a bonus action.

Poisonous Death.name: Poisonous Death
Poisonous Death.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, the poisonous blood in its body vaporizes, forming a cloud in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'a space until initiative count 20 on the next round.

Each creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and each creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Primal Voice of Doom.name: Primal Voice of Doom
Primal Voice of Doom.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] intones a disturbing invocation of the sun god at one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Leadership.name: Leadership
Leadership.description:
For 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw.

The creature can add a [[/r d4]] to its roll provided it can hear and understand the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time.

This effect ends if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is incapacitated.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AC) is available to grant the bonus described above to a nonhostile creature of your choice.

Watery Camouflage.name: 水流伪装
Watery Camouflage.description: In dim light or darkness, a [[lookup @name lowercase]] that’s underwater is invisible.

Reality-Altering Words.name: Reality-Altering Words
Reality-Altering Words.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] speaks a phrase that temporarily reshapes reality around it, warping the terrain, displacing creatures, and disrupting magic.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be pulled or pushed up to 25 feet toward or away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice) and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

Instead of pushing or pulling a creature that failed the saving throw, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can end one magical effect of its choice of 4th level or lower on that creature.

The area then becomes &Reference[difficult terrain] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Moving through this difficult terrain doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Frightened Anger.name: Frightened Anger
Frightened Anger.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects that reduce strong emotions, such as the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]{calm emotions} spell.

Light Incorporeality.name: Light Incorporeality
Light Incorporeality.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is translucent when standing in moonlight and is immune to damage from all nonmagical weapons in such conditions.

Reed Walk.name: Reed Walk
Reed Walk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across undergrowth or rivers without making an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[difficult terrain] of this kind doesn’t cost it extra moment.

Sense Consecrated.name: Sense Consecrated
Sense Consecrated.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of Celestials, consecrated places or objects, and creatures wielding divine or celestial power, such as clerics, paladins, or aasimars, within 60 feet of it.

affects.special: Creatures wielding divine or celestial power, such as clerics, paladins, or aasimars,

Spellcasting Animosity.name: Spellcasting Animosity
Spellcasting Animosity.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees a creature cast a spell, the ape has advantage on attack rolls against that creature on the ape’s next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

utility.condition: If the NPC sees a creature cast a spell

Face Peel.name: Face Peel
Face Peel.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] peels the face off one creature grappled by her.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

The target’s hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. While its hp maximum is reduced in this way, the target has disadvantage on all Charisma checks.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Diadv. CHA Checks.name: Diadv. CHA Checks
Diadv. CHA Checks.description: While its hp maximum is reduced in this way, the target has disadvantage on all Charisma checks.

Parry Spell.name: Parry Spell
Parry Spell.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] succeeds on a saving throw against a spell of 4th level or lower that targets only the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the spell has no effect.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] succeeds on the saving throw by 5 or more, the spell is reflected back at the spellcaster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

Bludgeoning Bounce.name: Bludgeoning Bounce
Bludgeoning Bounce.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to bludgeoning damage, it takes no damage and instead is pushed up to 15 feet away from the source of the bludgeoning damage. If the damage is from a critical hit, the orb is pushed up to 30 feet.

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales lightning in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] that is [[lookup @target.template.width activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet wide.

Each target in that line must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Spore Burst.name: Spore Burst
Spore Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases hallucinogenic spores in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t incapacitated.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

Burn from the Inside.name: Burn from the Inside
Burn from the Inside.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of him that is infected with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s deadly ichor disease.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage and catches fire.

On a success, the target takes half the damage and doesn’t catch fire.

Until a creature uses an action to douse the fire, the target takes [[/damage average activity=k5X64HCAoZUqPAx3]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

Moonlight Step.name: 月光飞步
Moonlight Step.description:
The [[lookup @name]] teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

The origin and destination spaces must contain moonlight.

Dissolving Gaze.name: Dissolving Gaze
Dissolving Gaze.description:
When a creature that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s eyes starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force it to make a [[/save format=long]] if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature.

On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the acid damage it takes, and it is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the start of its next turn.

This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn.

If the creature does so, it can’t see the paralyzed until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

save.condition: When a creature that can see the drakon’s eyes starts its turn near the drakon

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: The target is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the start of its next turn.

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide while underwater or in dim light.

Aura of Luck.name: Aura of Luck
Aura of Luck.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by an aura that manipulates the luck of those near the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Each friendly creature, other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=CJZN892FhzMsOk5B]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

Each hostile creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that grants a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

This feature also includes Active Effects that provide disadvantage on ability saves. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls.

+1 Attacks/Saves Bonus.name: +1 Attacks/Saves Bonus
+1 Attacks/Saves Bonus.description: All friendly creatures within 10 feet of the nichny have +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

Disadv. Attacks/Saves.name: Disadv. Attacks/Saves
Disadv. Attacks/Saves.description: All hostile creatures within 10 feet of the nichny have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

Chilling Acidic Body.name: Chilling Acidic Body
Chilling Acidic Body.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Counting Compulsion.name: Counting Compulsion
Counting Compulsion.description:
If a creature uses an action to point out an ordered group of objects that the rubezahl can see, such as a pile of gravel, the demon is compelled to count the entire group.

Until the end of its next turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and it can’t take reactions.

Once it has counted a given group of objects, it can’t be compelled to count those objects again.

Counting Compulsion.name: Counting Compulsion
Counting Compulsion.description: Until the end of its next turn, the rubezahl has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and it can’t take reactions.

Season’s Change.name: Season’s Change
Season’s Change.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes fire damage, its speed is increased by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. If it takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Speed +10.name: Speed +10
Speed +10.description: The sap demon's speed is increased by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Speed -10.name: 速度降低 10 尺
Speed -10.description: The sap demon's speed is decreased by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Blood Bolt.name: 血蚀箭
Blood Bolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature with blood, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

save.condition: If the target is a creature with blood

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Snow Sight.name: Snow Sight
Snow Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see through areas obscured by snow or fog without penalty.

Boiler Weakness.name: Boiler Weakness
Boiler Weakness.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn immersed in water, or if it was soaked with at least 20 gallons of water on its previous turn, it risks losing steam pressure in its boiler.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its internal fire is extinguished.

Until its internal fire is relit, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] speed is halved, its AC is reduced by 2, and it must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns.

On a failure, it stops repeating this saving throw and becomes dormant, effectively dead until the fire is relit.

A Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of the golem can take an action to relight the golem’s internal fire, making it active again.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect is available on the Effects tab to apply the changes to the golem's speed and AC.

Speed & AC Reduction.name: Speed & AC Reduction
Speed & AC Reduction.description: Until its internal fire is relit, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] speed is halved, its AC is reduced by 2, and it must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns.

Spray of Moonlight.name: Spray of Moonlight
Spray of Moonlight.description:
The [[lookup @name]] sends moonlight flooding out from her.

Each creature within 15 feet of her must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the [[lookup @name]] is standing in an area of moonlight when she uses this action, each creature in the area has disadvantage on the saving throw.

A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Limited Amphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
Limited Amphibiousness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 6 hours to avoid suffocating.

Void Aura.name: Void Aura
Void Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by a chilling cloud.

A creature that isn’t a construct or undead and that starts its turn within 5 feet of the nihileth must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

In addition, a creature infected with [[/item nihilethic rot]] takes [[/damage average]] damage when it starts its turn within this aura.

Thunderstrike.name: Thunderstrike
Thunderstrike.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] calls a sizzling bolt of lightning out of the sky, or from the air if underground or indoors, to strike a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 150 feet of it.

Each creature within 20 feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the creature takes 36 ([[/r 8d8]]) lightning damage and is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn’t stunned.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Carry Off.name: Carry Off
Carry Off.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fly at half its flying speed when dragging two creatures it has grappled or at its full flying speed if dragging only one creature it has grappled.

Command Vermin.name: Command Vermin
Command Vermin.description:
The [[lookup @name]] can command any Beast with an Intelligence of 2 or lower within 30 feet of it that isn’t under the magical control of another creature, provided the Beast is insectoid and doesn’t have a Challenge Rating higher than the spawn’s.

The Beast obeys the spawn’s commands to the best of its ability, heedless of its own safety.

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half her flying speed without provoking &Reference[opportunity attacks].

Soul Drain.name: Soul Drain
Soul Drain.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces a target to 0 hp, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] consumes that creature’s soul.

The victim must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or immediately die as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] consumes its soul.

A creature killed in this way can be restored to life only by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qLeEXZDbW5y4bmLY]{true resurrection} or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is killed within 120 feet of the body of a soul it consumed and the victim has been dead for no longer than 1 minute, the victim’s soul returns to the body and returns to life, &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} and stable with 0 hp.

save.condition: If the soul eater reduces a target to 0 hit points

Victim Stable.name: Victim Stable
Victim Stable.condition: If the soul eater is killed

affects.special: Body of a consumed soul that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute

Stable but Unconscious.name: Stable but Unconscious
Stable but Unconscious.description: The victim’s soul returns to the body and returns to life, &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} and stable with 0 hp.

Stuff of Dreams.name: Stuff of Dreams
Stuff of Dreams.description: Made partially from dreams and imagination, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t fully real. Any critical hit against the sandman is a normal hit.

Lamenting Engulfment.name: Lamenting Engulfment
Lamenting Engulfment.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it.

The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns or sing a lament of the mistakes and misdeeds it has performed in its lifetime.

While singing, the engulfed creature can still act, but it can’t otherwise speak, including casting spells with verbal components.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

Engulfed.name: 吞没
Engulfed.description: The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the ravenala.

Lightning Jolt.name: Lightning Jolt
Lightning Jolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be affected by [[/item Contagious Lightning]].

Hooked Spider Net.name: Hooked Spider Net
Hooked Spider Net.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}

While restrained, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

Any creature, including the restrained target, can take an action to remove the net by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

If the check succeeds by 5 or more, the creature breaks the net instead, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use the broken net again until it finishes a long rest.

Keen Sight and Smell.name: 敏锐视嗅觉
Keen Sight and Smell.description: [[lookup @name]]依赖视觉或嗅觉进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。

Necrotic Slam.name: Necrotic Slam
Necrotic Slam.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Shifting Floor.name: Shifting Floor
Shifting Floor.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves into a creature’s space or starts its turn in another creature’s space, the creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

A prone creature must succeed on a [[/check format=long]] to stand up in a space occupied by the swarm.

Sure-footed Skater.name: Sure-footed Skater
Sure-footed Skater.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is on snow or ice, it has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Sense Magic.name: Sense Magic
Sense Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses magic within 30 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{detect magic} spell but isn’t itself magical.

Whirling Winds.name: Whirling Winds
Whirling Winds.description: Gale force winds rage around the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body. Arrows, bolts, and other ordinary projectiles launched at the dragon are deflected upward and automatically miss. Boulders hurled by giants or siege engines, and similar projectiles, are unaffected.

Ethereal Lure.name: Ethereal Lure
Ethereal Lure.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an orb of faint, blue light on a point it can see within 20 feet of it. The light glows until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

When a creature that isn’t an [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn within 60 feet of the orb and can see the light, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the start of its next turn.

While charmed, the creature must take the &Reference[Dash] action and move toward the light by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the light.

It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the charmed creature enters the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s snares, it has disadvantage on the saving throw to avoid being restrained.

save.condition: Creatures within 60 feet of the orb

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the start of its next turn.

Desperate Hunger.name: Desperate Hunger
Desperate Hunger.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is below half its hp maximum, it has advantage on melee attack rolls against creatures that aren’t Constructs.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

Adv. Melee Attacks.name: Adv. Melee Attacks
Adv. Melee Attacks.description: The NPC has advantage on melee attack rolls against creatures that aren’t Constructs.

Weight of Wings.name: Weight of Wings
Weight of Wings.description:
A creature that starts its turn in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space has its speed halved and must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[blinded aplly=false]{blinded}.

Both effects end when the creature ends its turn outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the blinding effect of Weight of Wings for the next 24 hours.

Heart-Stopping Stare.name: Heart-Stopping Stare
Heart-Stopping Stare.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] terrifies a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it with a look.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains hp equal to the psychic damage dealt.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Chill of the Void.name: Chill of the Void
Chill of the Void.description:
Creatures with resistance to cold damage don’t have resistance to the cold damage dealt by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

A creature with immunity to cold damage is still immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s cold damage.

Harrying Attacks.name: Harrying Attacks
Harrying Attacks.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks more than one creature in the same turn, the first target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Icy Embrace.name: Icy Embrace
Icy Embrace.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] blasts wintry weather on a point she can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of that point must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by ice until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t restrained.

The area then becomes icy, difficult terrain for 1 minute.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by ice until the end of its next turn.

Arcane Doubling.name: Arcane Doubling
Arcane Doubling.description:
While in combat, at the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] rapidly creates duplicates of itself as an automatic defense mechanism.

These duplicates immediately form into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.8ihbbjkaOFTPbI73]{swarm of rats} in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its body language commands.

The swarm acts on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its reaction to move up to its speed with the swarm, provided it is in the swarm’s space when the swarm moves.

The swarm remains for 1 minute, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses it as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than two swarms of rats under its control at a time.

Tree Bound.name: Tree Bound
Tree Bound.description:
The vine troll skeleton is magically bound to a @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.fm2p5JVYtEBfIV0n]{duskthorn dryad}, tree, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NB6wUgVqeOQtsQKu]{treant}, and the skeleton must stay within 1 mile of it.

If the skeleton’s bound duskthorn dryad, tree, or treant dies, the skeleton is immediately destroyed and doesn’t regenerate.

Sudden Strike.name: Sudden Strike
Sudden Strike.description: When a creature more than 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves to a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one [[/item Khopesh]] attack against it.

Magical Discharge.name: Magical Discharge
Magical Discharge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases some of its stored magical energy in a burst.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

After using Magical Discharge, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t do so again until it successfully siphons magic from a creature or until it finishes a long rest.

Sandslash.name: Sandslash
Sandslash.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] intensifies the vortex of sand that surrounds it.

Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Twisted.name: Twisted
Twisted.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks a creature from hiding, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]]or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

save.condition: When the dust goblin attacks a creature from hiding

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Water Jet.name: Water Jet
Water Jet.description:
Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.w7eitkpD7QQTB6j0.JournalEntryPage.y0TkcdyoZlOTmAFT]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then swims up to half its swimming speed without provoking &Reference[opportunity attacks].

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must be underwater to use this bonus action.

Sunlight Petrification.name: Sunlight Petrification
Sunlight Petrification.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains in nonmagical sunlight for 1 minute, it becomes &Reference[petrified apply=false]{petrified} at the end of that minute.

Made of Shadows (Shadow Form Only).name: Made of Shadows (Shadow Form Only)
Made of Shadows (Shadow Form Only).description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there.

In addition, it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect is enabled in the Effects tab that adds resistance to piercing and slashing damage (the herald is already resistant to bludgeoning damage).

Displace.name: Displace
Displace.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sends one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it outside of the flow of time, shunting the creature to a tiny demiplane.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} and magically shunted outside of time for 1 minute.

The creature disappears for the duration, returning to the space it previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied space, when the effect ends.

At the end of each of its turns, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description:
You are &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} and magically shunted outside of time for 1 minute.

At the end of each of your turns, you can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Beguiling Whispers.name: Beguiling Whispers
Beguiling Whispers.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] speaks sweet words to a creature she can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her and that can hear her.

The creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} for 1 minute.

While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against spells cast by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description:
The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} for 1 minute.

While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against spells cast by the enchantress.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

Mobile Grappler.name: Mobile Grappler
Mobile Grappler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move at its full speed when dragging a Medium or smaller creature it has grappled.

Shadow Slip.name: Shadow Slip
Shadow Slip.description:
When a creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of him attacks him, he takes on the quality of his manifest delusions, temporarily becoming ghostly.

The attack roll has disadvantage, and if it hits, the [[lookup @name]] takes only half the damage from the attack.

Dozens of Eyes.name: Dozens of Eyes
Dozens of Eyes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on saving throws against being blinded.

In addition, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t blinded, creatures attacking it can’t benefit from traits and features that rely on a creature’s allies distracting or surrounding the rift swine, such as the Pack Tactics trait or Sneak Attack class feature.

Running Leap.name: Running Leap
Running Leap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can long jump up to 25 feet.

Stunning Glance.name: Stunning Glance
Stunning Glance.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sends a seductive glance at a creature she can see within 30 feet of her.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

On a successful save, a creature is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Stunning Glance for the next 24 hours.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Frightful Charge.name: Frightful Charge
Frightful Charge.description:
While mounted, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] lets loose a terrifying cry. It then moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. This movement doesn’t provoke &Reference[opportunity attacks].

The first time it enters a creature’s space during this move, that creature must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

A frightened creature can make a [[/save format=long activity=obOhPyuIuHL4Bqse]] at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

affects.special: The first time it enters a creature’s space during this move

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

Swamp Camouflage.name: Swamp Camouflage
Swamp Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

Ethereal Step.name: Ethereal Step
Ethereal Step.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

When it leaves or enters the Material Plane, a puff of gray smoke briefly appears in the space on the Material Plane it leaves or enters.

Protector’s Instincts.name: Protector’s Instincts
Protector’s Instincts.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on initiative rolls while in its temple or within 30 feet of a priest of its deity.

Foundry Note

There is an Active Effect (AE) that you can enable advantage to Initiative in the Effects tab of this sheet

Fiery Roar.name: Fiery Roar
Fiery Roar.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a terrifying, flame-coated roar in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Bone Shard.name: 骸骨碎片
Bone Shard.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} as it is pinned to the ground by the shard.

A creature, including the restrained target, can take its action to free the target by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

save.condition: On a hit

Prone & Restrained.name: 倒地和束缚
Prone & Restrained.description: The target is knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} as it is pinned to the ground by the shard.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no {type} components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At will:

3/day each:

2/day each:

1/day each:

Absorb Flesh.name: Absorb Flesh
Absorb Flesh.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills a creature while within 15 feet of it, the creature’s body is absorbed into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qLeEXZDbW5y4bmLY]{true resurrection} or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell.

Energized Body.name: Energized Body
Energized Body.description: A creature wearing metal or wielding a metal weapon that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Rime Tendril.name: Rime Tendril
Rime Tendril.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) if it is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have another creature grappled.

Escape Check.name: 逃脱检定
Escape Check.condition: If grappled by the rime worm

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} if it is a Medium or smaller creature

Divine Weapons.name: Divine Weapons
Divine Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d6 necrotic damage or radiant damage (included in the attack), the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice.

Watery Body.name: Watery Body
Watery Body.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

A creature that starts its turn in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage as it is buffeted by the swirl of water.

Wastes Walk.name: Wastes Walk
Wastes Walk.description: Difficult terrain composed of rocks or sand doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Draining Touch.name: Draining Touch
Draining Touch.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.

This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest after drinking 1 pint of water.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Mortal Void Traveler.name: Mortal Void Traveler
Mortal Void Traveler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air or ambient pressure.

Ash Breath.name: Ash Breath
Ash Breath.description:
The ash [[lookup @name lowercase]] blistering hot, choking ash in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Intoxicating Breath.name: Intoxicating Breath
Intoxicating Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] burps intoxicating gas in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) poison damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Interdimensional Step.name: Interdimensional Step
Interdimensional Step.description:
The star [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Small tears in reality appear at the origin and destination when it uses this bonus action.

Infernal Blessing.name: Infernal Blessing
Infernal Blessing.description:
While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is conscious and wearing no armor and wielding no shield, it adds its Charisma modifier to its AC (included above) and saving throws.

In addition, magical darkness doesn’t impede the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s darkvision.

Charging Archer.name: Charging Archer
Charging Archer.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target after hitting the target with a Longbow attack, the forest hunter can make one Dagger attack against the target as a bonus action.

Deadly Gaze.name: Deadly Gaze
Deadly Gaze.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

A Humanoid slain by this attack rises 8 hours later as a specter under the qwyllion’s control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life.

The qwyllion can have no more than ten specters under its control at one time.

Specter Rises.name: Specter Rises
Specter Rises.condition: A Humanoid slain by this attack

Slurp.name: Slurp
Slurp.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] feeds on a creature paralyzed by its [[/item Tentacles]] attack.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hp maximum is reduced by half the amount of acid damage dealt by the Tentacles attack that caused the paralysis, and the charger regains hp equal to that amount.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Frightful Presence.name: Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
Each creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice that is within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute, and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Hateful Presence.name: Hateful Presence
Hateful Presence.description:
Each friendly creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a +2 bonus on weapon damage rolls but can’t use the &Reference[Help] action.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect can provide the target with the bonuses mentioned above. However, it's important to monitor the distance between you and the creatures that received the bonus. There is no automated system to automatically calculate distances and revoke the bonus if a creature moves out of the area of effect (AOE).

+2 Weapon Damage.name: +2 Weapon Damage
+2 Weapon Damage.description: The target gains a +2 bonus on weapon damage rolls but can’t use the &Reference[Help] action.

Stout.name: Stout
Stout.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and saving throws made against effects that would push it or knock it prone.

Hovering Darkness.name: Hovering Darkness
Hovering Darkness.description:
While flying, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] shakes a fine, magical dander from her wings, and a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from her, moves with her, and spreads around corners.

The darkness lasts as long as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies and maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell).

Darkvision can’t penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it.

If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

Token of Favor.name: Token of Favor
Token of Favor.description:
The [[lookup @name]] can spend 1 minute cutting and tying a lock of her hair into a small token of her favor.

A creature that is wearing or carrying the favor gains the benefits of the [[/item Magic Resistance]] trait.

The Queen can revoke this magic at any time (no action required). If she does so, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects for 24 hours.

Siphon Blood.name: Siphon Blood
Siphon Blood.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] drains blood from nearby creatures.

Each creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If at least one creature fails the saving throw, the next spell the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts is cast as if the spell used a spell slot two levels higher than the spell’s lowest level.

affects.special: Creatures that aren't Construct or Undead

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Poisoned Claw.name: Poisoned Claw
Poisoned Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Damage Transfer.name: Damage Transfer
Damage Transfer.description: While engulfing a creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down), and the engulfed creature takes the other half.

Earthen Camouflage.name: Earthen Camouflage
Earthen Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy, muddy, or rocky terrain.

Sand Dancer.name: Sand Dancer
Sand Dancer.description: While in sandy terrain, the mirager takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

Ice Walk.name: Ice Walk
Ice Walk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across icy and snowy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[difficult terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost her extra movement.

Rushing Bite.name: Rushing Bite
Rushing Bite.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a [[/item Bite]] attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the temple dog.

If the target is pushed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move up to 10 feet straight toward the target without provoking &Reference[opportunity attacks].

save.condition: If the attacking creature moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Bite attack on the same turn,

Spore Breath.name: Spore Breath
Spore Breath.description:
The thrall exhales a blast of acidic spores from its rotten lungs in a 15-foot cone.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is infected with the mindrot disease (see the [[/item Mindrot]] trait).

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t infected.

Diseased.name: Diseased
Diseased.description: The target is infected with mindrot disease.

Spider Passivism.name: Spider Passivism
Spider Passivism.description: No spider can willingly attack the [[lookup @name lowercase]], unless attacked first. A spider can be forced to do so through magical means.

Weep Acid.name: Weep Acid
Weep Acid.description:
Thick tears of dark, acidic sap stream continuously down the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s face and trunk.

A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage.

save.condition: Touch or hit with a melee attack

Void Slip.name: Void Slip
Void Slip.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] twists the fabric of space around it, disappearing and reappearing in an unoccupied space it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Burst of Breath.name: Burst of Breath
Burst of Breath.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage noted in its [[/item Breath Born]] trait.

Drift Forward.name: Drift Forward
Drift Forward.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of its future self.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage and is pulled forward in time.

On a success, the target takes half the damage and isn’t pulled forward in time.

A target pulled forward in time disappears, along with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s future self, as the future self pulls the target with it. At the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target and the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s future self reappear in the spaces they previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied spaces.

When the target reappears, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn as it recovers from the disorienting experience.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the above mechanics.

Target & Future Self Reappear.name: Target & Future Self Reappear
Target & Future Self Reappear.chatFlavor: The target and the drifter's future self appears

Drift Forward | Disadv..name: Drift Forward | Disadv.
Drift Forward | Disadv..description: You have disappeared from your current timeline. When When you reappear, you have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn as you recover from the disorienting experience.

Temporal Strike.name: Temporal Strike
Temporal Strike.description:
One creature Black Night can see and that he hit with a [[/item Horseman’s Bolt]] or [[/item Longsword]] attack within the last minute must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or age 16 ([[/r 3d10]]) years.

A creature that ages this way has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws that use Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution until the aging is reversed.

A creature that ages beyond its lifespan dies immediately. The aging lasts until the creature finishes a long rest, or until it is reversed by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to Black Night's Temporal Strike for 24 hours.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that applies disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls at this time.

Aging.name: Aging
Aging.description: A creature that ages has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws that use Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution until the aging is reversed.

Fey Ancestry.name: 妖精血统
Fey Ancestry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put it to sleep.

Spread Madness.name: Spread Madness
Spread Madness.description:
Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or suffer @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.ypk2L9feVwTx0QVj]{short-term madness} for [[/r 1d10]] minutes.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this legendary action only when he is in moonlight.

Web Walker.name: Web Walker
Web Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Blade Current.name: Blade Current
Blade Current.description: When a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name]] stands up from prone, he can make one [[/item Longsword]] attack against that creature.

Slumbering Song.name: Slumbering Song
Slumbering Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical song to one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] on fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing, the target has disadvantage on this saving throw. Otherwise, the effect ends for a target if the target takes damage while below half its hp maximum.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Slumbering Song for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have up to two creatures unconscious from its song at a time.

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description:
The target is &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Essence of Rage.name: Essence of Rage
Essence of Rage.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be enraged until the end of its next turn.

While enraged, the target has advantage on melee attack rolls and must move to and attack the nearest creature other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

In addition, attack rolls against the enraged target have advantage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate advantage on attacks at this time.

Enraged.name: Enraged
Enraged.description:
The target is enraged until the end of its next turn.

While enraged, the target has advantage on melee attack rolls and must move to and attack the nearest creature other than the spirit.

In addition, attack rolls against the enraged target have advantage.

Infectious Insanity.name: Infectious Insanity
Infectious Insanity.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically assaults the minds of up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it.

Each target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute as its mind fills with thoughts of eldritch terrors and otherworldly entities.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t incapacitated.

An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute as its mind fills with thoughts of eldritch terrors and otherworldly entities.

Green Regeneration.name: Green Regeneration
Green Regeneration.description: While in a forest, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/heal]] at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp.

Vine-Wrapped Weapons.name: Vine-Wrapped Weapons
Vine-Wrapped Weapons.description:
The poisonous vines growing from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] entwine around its weapon.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d4 poison damage (included in the attack).

Free Water Spirit.name: Free Water Spirit
Free Water Spirit.description: While in contact with water, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores &Reference[difficult terrain], and magical effects can’t reduce her speed or cause her to be restrained. In addition, she can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

Enervating Surge.name: Enervating Surge
Enervating Surge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits waves of necrotic energy.

Each creature within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature that can’t breathe because of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Breath-Stealing Presence]] has disadvantage on the saving throw.

If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

A Humanoid slain by this effect rises [[/r 1d4]] hours later as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.t8WYD7ak07X7xpx8]{mummy} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than five mummies under its control at one time.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.description:
When a creature casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1nhIxh0DsJsntCfj]{knock} spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s chains, the chains release a blast of unholy flame.

The spellcaster must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the spellcaster survives, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must immediately make a [[/save format=long activity=tLAygESFgroggm2Z]]. On a success, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s chains fall away. It is restored to its senses and the form it had before it was chained, typically a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.m4H3hjamBNMH09S9]{deva}.
