On a failure, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains chained for 7 days, and during that time, any further attempts to cast knock on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s chains fail.

Verdant Nature.name: Verdant Nature
Verdant Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require food or sleep.

Diligent Tracker.name: Diligent Tracker
Diligent Tracker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks that rely on scent or that are made to find a creature.

Breath Born.name: Breath Born
Breath Born.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has immunity to a type of damage based on the type of dragon that killed it: acid (black, copper), cold (silver, white), fire (brass, gold, red), lightning (blue, bronze), or poison (green).

Draconic Breath.name: Draconic Breath
Draconic Breath.description:
The ashwalker exhales elemental energy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage noted in its [[/item Breath Born]] trait on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Root.name: Root
Root.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 16).

Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has four roots, each of which can grapple only one target.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}.

Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}.

Swamp Walk.name: Swamp Walk
Swamp Walk.description: &Reference[Difficult terrain] composed of mud, shallow water, and water plants doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Snow Walk.name: Snow Walk
Snow Walk.description: The [[lookup @name]] can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[difficult terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost her extra movement.

Envelop.name: Envelop
Envelop.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] envelops a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of it that is restrained by its [[/item Bone Shard]] or a Large or smaller creature grappled by it.

The enveloped target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}, &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns or take [[/damage average]] damage.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the enveloped target moves with it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than four creatures enveloped at a time.

A creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], including the enveloped creature, can free the enveloped creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

Any creature that makes such an attempt takes [[/damage average activity=FOO]] damage.

Blinded, Restrained, Unable to Breathe.name: Blinded, Restrained, Unable to Breathe
Blinded, Restrained, Unable to Breathe.description: The enveloped target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}, &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, and unable to breathe.

Hasten Consumption.name: Hasten Consumption
Hasten Consumption.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a wave of psychic energy to hasten the demise of nearby creatures, bringing them one step closer to having their souls consumed.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature reduced to below half its hp maximum by this effect has disadvantage on the saving throw against the soul eater’s Soul Drain for 1 minute.

Joker’s Shuffle.name: Joker’s Shuffle
Joker’s Shuffle.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exchanges locations with a Medium or smaller creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and target each teleport to the other’s space, and each becomes covered in a magical illusion to look and sound like the other.

A creature must take an action to visually inspect an illusion and succeed on a [[/check format=long]] to discern that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and target are disguised.

The illusions last for 1 minute, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Shriek.name: Shriek
Shriek.description:
Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can hear the demon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

Stinger.name: 诡刺
Stinger.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 hour.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Drain.name: Drain
Drain.description: [[lookup @name]] makes one attack with [[/item Drain Life]].

Poison Ray.name: Poison Ray
Poison Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Speak with Beasts.name: Speak with Beasts
Speak with Beasts.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a language.

Skitter.name: 窜行
Skitter.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half their speed and makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

This movement doesn’t provoke &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]

Lightning’s Kiss.name: Lightning’s Kiss
Lightning’s Kiss.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] launches a bolt of lightning at up to three targets it can see within 30 feet of it.

Each target must make a [[/save format=long]] taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Breaker of Boats.name: Breaker of Boats
Breaker of Boats.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures made of wood or lighter materials.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Blood Frenzy.name: 尸山血河
Blood Frenzy.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all of its hp.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the benefit above.

affects.special: Any creature that doesn’t have all of its hp.

Adv. Melee Attacks.name: Adv. Melee Attacks
Adv. Melee Attacks.description: The mahoru has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all of its hp.

Fiery Weapons.name: Fiery Weapons
Fiery Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 fire damage (included in the attack).

Spirit Spores.name: Spirit Spores
Spirit Spores.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a puff of psychotropic spores around itself.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t incapacitated.

When an incapacitated creature moves, it moves in a random direction.

An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Jolt.name: Jolt
Jolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

Movement -10 ft..name: Movement -10 ft.
Movement -10 ft..description: The target’s speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

Nauseating Stench.name: Nauseating Stench
Nauseating Stench.description:
A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature that fails this saving throw is also &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} while poisoned in this way.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Nauseating Stench for the next 24 hours.

Poisoned & Incapacitated.name: 中毒并失能
Poisoned & Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature that fails this saving throw is also &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} while poisoned in this way.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Blood Armor.name: Blood Armor
Blood Armor.description:
Each time a creature with blood hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s AC increases by 1 until the end of its next turn.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s AC can’t be increased to more than 20 from this trait.

Foundry Note

Active Effects are available on the Effects tab to increase the herald's AC from
1 to 5.

Ethereal Coat.name: Ethereal Coat
Ethereal Coat.description: The mngwa’s AC includes its Charisma modifier (included above).

Mounted Charge.name: Mounted Charge
Mounted Charge.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while mounted and then hits it with a Lance attack on the same turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use a bonus action to command its mount to make one melee weapon attack against that creature as a reaction.

Discombobulating Bite.name: Discombobulating Bite
Discombobulating Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be discombobulated until the end of its next turn.

A discombobulated creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}, and when it moves, it moves in a random direction.

save.condition: When hit

Discombobulated.name: Discombobulated
Discombobulated.description:
The target is discombobulated until the end of its next turn.

A discombobulated creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}, and when it moves, it moves in a random direction.

Rune-Powered Weapons.name: Rune-Powered Weapons
Rune-Powered Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Planar Weapons.name: Planar Weapons
Planar Weapons.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 force damage (included in the attack).

Undead Fortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 hp, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the nihileth drops to 1 hp instead.

Wind of Decay.name: Wind of Decay
Wind of Decay.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 0 ft. , one target in the rotting wind’s space. [[/damage average extended]].

Interdimensional Nature.name: Interdimensional Nature
Interdimensional Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, sleep, or ambient pressure.

Dark Devotion.name: 献身黑暗
Dark Devotion.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Warden’s Reach.name: Warden’s Reach
Warden’s Reach.description: A creature within 15 feet of a [[lookup @name lowercase]] that moves away from it provokes an &Reference[Opportunity Attacks] even if the creature takes the &Reference[Disengage] action.

Searing Breath.name: Searing Breath
Searing Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] of fire.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Fallen Glory.name: Fallen Glory
Fallen Glory.description:
Each creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 50 feet of it must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t knocked prone.

Forest’s Defender.name: Forest’s Defender
Forest’s Defender.description:
&Reference[Difficult terrain] composed of nonmagical plants doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement, and it can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

In addition, while in forested terrain, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on initiative rolls.

Piercing Bones.name: Piercing Bones
Piercing Bones.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., or [[/damage average activity=HxTW9tgUs6z2VD45]] damage if the collective has half its hp or fewer.

Slippery.name: Slippery
Slippery.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws and ability checks made to escape a grapple.

Unshakeable Fidelity.name: Unshakeable Fidelity
Unshakeable Fidelity.description: No spell, feature, trait, magic, or other effect can cause a [[lookup @name lowercase]] to act against or harm its mate or change its love or loyalty toward its mate.

Strength Drain.name: Strength Drain
Strength Drain.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has disadvantage on weapon attacks that use Strength until the end of its next turn.

If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new [[lookup @name lowercase]] rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the activity above.

Strength Drain.name: Strength Drain
Strength Drain.description: Until the end of its next turn, the creature has disadvantage on Strength-based weapon attacks.

Ball of Thorns.name: Ball of Thorns
Ball of Thorns.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the ball bursts, scattering sharp thorns around the target.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity100]] feet of the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage.

save.condition: When hit

Luck-Stealing Bolt.name: Luck-Stealing Bolt
Luck-Stealing Bolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the above activity.

Disadv. Checks/Attacks.name: Disadv. Checks/Attacks
Disadv. Checks/Attacks.description: The target has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Freeze Prey.name: Freeze Prey
Freeze Prey.description:
One creature grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[petrified apply=false]{petrified} in ice for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

A petrified creature that takes fire damage has advantage on the saving throw.

Petrified.name: 石化
Petrified.description:
The target is &Reference[petrified apply=false]{petrified} in ice for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Air Hatred.name: Air Hatred
Air Hatred.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are flying.

Gaze of Ancient Light.name: Gaze of Ancient Light
Gaze of Ancient Light.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] opens all of its eyes and emits a burst of blinding light.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t blinded.

A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more is also &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Corrupting Gaze.name: Corrupting Gaze
Corrupting Gaze.description:
One creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The target’s hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

A Humanoid slain by this effect rises 24 hours later as a [[lookup @name lowercase]], unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
If destroyed, an [[lookup @name lowercase]] rises again in [[/r 2d4]] days, regaining all its hp and becoming active again.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] rises, it appears within 5 feet of its remains.

Only burying its mortal remains in consecrated or hallowed ground prevents this trait from functioning.

Elemental Leaves.name: Elemental Leaves
Elemental Leaves.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s leaves rain acid, shed bolts of lightning, shake loose icicles, or similarly emit the elemental energies of the dragon that grew the tree.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage noted in the [[/item Elemental Affinity]] trait.

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.description:
One creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage, and if it is Medium or smaller, it is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 12).

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water.

If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the damage and is pushed out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Vortex Form Only

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 12).

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water.

Infernal Bond.name: Infernal Bond
Infernal Bond.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is magically bound to an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.dLQiESMsfsXijD5c]{imp}.

The imp acts as an ally of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s, obeying its spoken commands.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can perceive through the imp’s senses, speak through its mouth, and communicate with it telepathically even if the two aren’t on the same plane of existence.

Enervating Breath.name: Enervating Breath
Enervating Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales pain-inducing, purple-black energy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] that is [[lookup @target.template.width activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet wide.

Each creature in the line must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t stunned.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} until the end of its next turn.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 minute.

The paralyzed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks a target that is not in the charger’s space, the target takes half the acid damage and has advantage on the saving throw.

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description:
The target is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} for 1 minute.

The paralyzed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description:
At the start of its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] detects an elephant within 120 feet of it, this trait is always active, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t choose to end it until it starts its turn more than 120 feet from an elephant.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: The reckless creature has advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Step Between Seconds.name: Step Between Seconds
Step Between Seconds.description: When a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space within 60 feet that it occupied within the past minute.

utility.condition: When a creature the chronalmental can see moves within 5 feet of it,

Hide by Firelight.name: Hide by Firelight
Hide by Firelight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in fire or in areas lit by nonmagical fire.

Ray of Light.name: Ray of Light
Ray of Light.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Darkness Hypersensitivity.name: Darkness Hypersensitivity
Darkness Hypersensitivity.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] damage when it starts its turn in magical darkness.

While in magical darkness, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that sets all ability checks to roll at disadvantage. Currently, automation to apply disadvantage on attack rolls is unavailable, but the AE can act as a reminder.

Darkness Hypersensitivity.name: Darkness Hypersensitivity
Darkness Hypersensitivity.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Blinding Salt Spray.name: Blinding Salt Spray
Blinding Salt Spray.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body, and each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Agonizing Gaze.name: Agonizing Gaze
Agonizing Gaze.description:
When a creature that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force it to make a [[/save format=long]] if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature.

On a failed saving throw, the creature’s pain threshold lowers, and it becomes vulnerable to all damage types until the end of its next turn.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn.

If the creature does so, it can’t see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

DV to all Damage Types.name: DV to all Damage Types
DV to all Damage Types.description: The target is vulnerable to all damage types until the end of its next turn.

Elemental Affinity.name: 元素亲合
Elemental Affinity.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has immunity to a type of damage based on the type of dragon that grew it: acid (black, copper), cold (silver, white), fire (brass, gold, red), lighting (blue, bronze), or poison (green).

Foundry Note

An Active Effect is available on the Effects tab of this character sheet to enable the specific damage immunity you choose.

Acid Immunity (Black, Copper).name: Acid Immunity (Black, Copper)
Acid Immunity (Black, Copper).description: The tree has immunity to acid damage.

Cold Immunity (Silver, White).name: Cold Immunity (Silver, White)
Cold Immunity (Silver, White).description: The tree has immunity to cold damage.

Fire Immunity (Brass, Fire).name: Fire Immunity (Brass, Fire)
Fire Immunity (Brass, Fire).description: The tree has immunity to fire damage.

Lightning Immunity (Blue, Bronze).name: Lightning Immunity (Blue, Bronze)
Lightning Immunity (Blue, Bronze).description: The tree has immunity to lightning damage.

Poison (Green).name: Poison (Green)
Poison (Green).description: The tree has immunity to poison damage.

Prediction.name: Prediction
Prediction.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an ability check or attack, it can choose to have advantage on the roll.

utility.condition: When the orobas makes an ability check or attack

Relentless Nature.name: Relentless Nature
Relentless Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require food, drink, or sleep.

Strangling Divination.name: Strangling Divination
Strangling Divination.description:
A Humanoid reduced to 0 hp while grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] experiences a brief vision of the future.

This effect works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XqzXSKNR75ZdYTA9]{divination} spell, except the reply is only as a mental vision and it can be about any specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 30 days.

Once a creature has received a vision in this way, it can’t do so again for 30 days.

Fey Scent.name: Fey Scent
Fey Scent.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

If it is tracking a Fey, Giant, or Humanoid whose scent it knows, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can continue tracking that creature if the creature moves into the Border Ethereal or teleports, provided the creature isn’t in the Border Ethereal for more than 1 minute or that the creature doesn’t teleport more than 100 feet at a time.

Twisted Path.name: Twisted Path
Twisted Path.description:
While in a nonmagical forest, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves no trail and can’t be tracked, except by magical means.

Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice within 30 feet of it that travel with it can’t retrace their own trails, and become hopelessly lost after 1 hour of travel with the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Creatures led astray by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have disadvantage on ability checks to discern their location or to navigate for 24 hours.

Point Blank Fencer.name: Point Blank Fencer
Point Blank Fencer.description:
A rapier deals one extra die of its damage when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with it (included in the attack).

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores the loading property of crossbows and doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll with a crossbow from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] may still have disadvantage on such an attack from other sources.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

Darakhul Fever.name: Darakhul Fever
Darakhul Fever.description:
Spread mainly through bite wounds, this disease makes itself known within 24 hours by swiftly debilitating the infected.

MORE

An infected creature must make a [[/save format=long]] after every long rest.

On a failed save, the victim takes [[/damage average]] damage, and its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.

This reduction lasts until the victim finishes a long rest after the disease is cured.

The victim recovers from the disease by making two consecutive successful saving throws. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{Greater restoration} cures the disease, while @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{lesser restoration} gives the victim advantage on the next saving throw.

Primarily spread among Humanoids, the disease can affect ogres, and therefore other Giants may be susceptible.

If a creature dies while infected with darakhul fever, roll a [[/r d20]] and add the character’s Constitution modifier, and find the result on the Adjustment Table below to determine what Undead form the victim’s body rises in.

d20Result
1-9None; victim is simply dead
10-16@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.OBujQLLPSmlJiZnL]{Ghoul}
17-20@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.IyIybE5t2adMEVUM]{Ghast}
21+@UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-creatures.Actor.0o8tN7kL2JZYOYWv]{Darakhul}

Mesmerizing Radiance.name: Mesmerizing Radiance
Mesmerizing Radiance.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] causes the light radiating from its body to shift color and pattern in a spellbinding display.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can see it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the display ends.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue the display. It can stop the display at any time, and the display ends if the liosalfar is incapacitated.

While charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s display, a creature is also &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}, and its speed is reduced to 0, as it is transfixed by the display.

The effect ends for a charmed creature if it takes any damage or if someone uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} until the display ends.

While charmed by the liosalfar's display, a creature is also &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}, and its speed is reduced to 0, as it is transfixed by the display.

Toxic Skin.name: Toxic Skin
Toxic Skin.description:
A creature that touches the mbielu or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage and must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

While poisoned in this way, a creature has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws as it experiences mild hallucinations.

The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Toxic Skin.name: Toxic Skin
Toxic Skin.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

While poisoned in this way, a creature has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws as it experiences mild hallucinations.

Killing Joke.name: 致命玩笑
Killing Joke.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] tells an ancient, nihilistic joke to one creature it can see within 60 feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} in a fit of laughter, becoming &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and unable to stand up for 1 minute.

A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is reduced to 0 hp instead.

The incapacitated target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking [[/damage average activity=X2Rs4cYePu988NmA]] damage on a failed save or ending the effect on itself on a success.

Save While Incapacitated.name: Save While Incapacitated
Save While Incapacitated.condition: If a creature is incapacitated by the grim jester

affects.special: Incapacitated creature by the grim jester

Prone & Incapacitated.name: Prone & Incapacitated
Prone & Incapacitated.description:
The target fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} in a fit of laughter, becoming &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and unable to stand up for 1 minute.

The incapacitated target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

Shredding Maw.name: Shredding Maw
Shredding Maw.description:
One creature grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is pulled up to 10 feet toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s central maw, which shreds the creature with churning gears, razor teeth, and whirling blades.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Telepathic Bond.name: Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a falseheart it has birthed. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its {CREATURE} don’t need to be on the same plane of existence.

Fire Incarnate.name: Fire Incarnate
Fire Incarnate.description:
Creatures with resistance to fire damage don’t have resistance to the fire damage dealt by the flame dragon.

A creature with immunity to fire damage is still immune to the dragon’s fire damage.

Flash.name: Flash
Flash.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a bright burst of light.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} for 1 minute.

A creature can make a [[/save format=long activity=azXPFS6eNW1HtI0P]] throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

save.condition: If the target was blinded by the Flash attack

Web Sense.name: Web Sense
Web Sense.description: While in contact with a web, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Hellish Weapons.name: Hellish Weapons
Hellish Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 fire damage (included in the attack).

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description:
Any creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Stench for the next 24 hours.

A [[lookup @name lowercase]] using this ability can’t also benefit from [[/item Master of Disguise]].

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Distortion Gaze.name: Distortion Gaze
Distortion Gaze.description:
Those who meet the gaze of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] experience the world seeming to twist at unnatural angles beneath their feet.

When a creature that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force the creature to make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature. On a failed save, the creature is disoriented until the start of its next turn.

While disoriented, a creature can’t take the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action, and when it moves for the first time on its turn, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=FOO]] throw or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can’t see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Disoriented.name: 迷失
Disoriented.description:
The target is disoriented until the start of its next turn.

While disoriented, the target can’t take the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action, and when it moves for the first time on its turn, it must succeed on another save.

Throw Leaves.name: Throw Leaves
Throw Leaves.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] noted in the [[/item Elemental Affinity]] trait.

Tactical Insight.name: Tactical Insight
Tactical Insight.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on initiative rolls, and friendly creatures within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s command can choose to take the [[lookup @name lowercase]] initiative instead of their own when combat starts.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is enabled on this feature that grants this actor advantage on Initiative.

Destiny Distortion Wave.name: Destiny Distortion Wave
Destiny Distortion Wave.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] frays the strands of fate in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If any creature that failed the saving throw is affected by a condition, such as &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} or &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}, those conditions are randomly redistributed among all the creatures that failed the saving throw.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

Book Flap.name: Book Flap
Book Flap.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fly up to 15 feet without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], as it flaps its pages.

Ravenous Gorge.name: Ravenous Gorge
Ravenous Gorge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] consumes the organs of a corpse within 5 feet of it that is less than 7 days old. It gains temporary hp equal to twice the dead creature’s CR for 1 hour.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use Ravenous Gorge on a corpse if it or another [[lookup @name lowercase]] has already use Ravenous Gorge on the corpse.

affects.special: A corpse within 5 feet of it that is less than 7 days old

Observant.name: Observant
Observant.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Insight) checks.

In addition, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] observes a creature for at least 1 minute, it has advantage on the first three attack rolls it makes against the creature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Active Effects that provide advantage on Perception and Insight checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply advantage to attack rolls.

The Insight skill is exposed on your sheet, as this trait grants an advantage to it. However, the proficiency bonus is removed (you'll see a -3 penalty on any Insight check).

Observant.name: Observant
Observant.description: The creature has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Insight) checks.

Noxious Aura.name: Noxious Aura
Noxious Aura.description:
At the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Noxious Aura for 24 hours.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Evasion.name: 反射闪避
Evasion.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Collective Mind.name: Collective Mind
Collective Mind.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s individual bones are connected via a hive mind.

It can telepathically communicate with any of its individual bones within 50 miles of it, and it can’t be surprised.

If the collective is reduced to half its hp or fewer, its Intelligence score is reduced to 1, it can’t cast spells, it immediately changes to its shapeless form, and it can’t take on a Humanoid form.

False Presence.name: False Presence
False Presence.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] detects as a Fey when sensed by spells and features, such as the detect evil and good spell or a paladin’s Divine Sense.

However, it is still a Fiend and can be subjected to spells and features that affect Fiends, such as Divine Smite.

Beasts and Plants find the berstuc’s presence soothing and don’t attack the [[lookup @name lowercase]] unless ordered to or provoked.

Nabboot.name: Nabboot
Nabboot.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be cursed with tomb taint.

The cursed target’s speed is halved, and its hp maximum decreases by 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) for every 24 hours that elapse.

If the curse reduces the target’s hp maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust.

The curse lasts until removed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse} spell or comparable magic.

Mountain Walk.name: Mountain Walk
Mountain Walk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb rocky surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[difficult terrain] composed of rocks or rocky debris doesn’t cost it extra movement.

Sanguine Curse.name: Sanguine Curse
Sanguine Curse.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses one creature she can see or sense within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be cursed for 1 minute. A creature automatically succeeds on this saving throw if it doesn’t have blood.

While cursed, the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns as its internal blood vessels rupture.

The cursed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target cursed at a time. If it curses another, the effect on the previous target ends.

Cursed & Incapacitated.name: Cursed & Incapacitated
Cursed & Incapacitated.description: The target is cursed and &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} for 1 minute.

Radiant Lasso.name: Radiant Lasso
Radiant Lasso.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 16) if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t already grappling a creature.

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, can’t tell a lie, and can’t teleport or be transported to another plane of existence unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] wills it.

Escape Check.name: 逃脱检定
Escape Check.condition: If the creature is grappled & Restrained

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}.

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, can’t tell a lie, and can’t teleport or be transported to another plane of existence unless the attacking creature wills it.

Stunning Word.name: Stunning Word
Stunning Word.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] speaks a brief, echoing word of power at up to three creatures it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

Each target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t stunned.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description:
The target is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} for 1 minute.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Unleashed Emotion.name: Unleashed Emotion
Unleashed Emotion.description:
On each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, it attacks the nearest creature it can see.

If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack for two turns in a row, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Change Shape]] to return to its whelp form and stops attacking.

Frightful Shadows.name: Frightful Shadows
Frightful Shadows.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a wave of shadows filled with frightening images of eyes, fangs, and other barely seen and terrifying beasts in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

A frightened creature must take the &Reference[Dash] action and move away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

gX05eY5rWI6xAo3t.name: 尖叫
gX05eY5rWI6xAo3t.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a loud shriek that is audible out to 100 feet.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can hear it must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Consume Host.name: Consume Host
Consume Host.description:
While inhabiting a Humanoid, [[lookup @name lowercase]] consumes the host from the inside.

The host takes [[/damage average]] damage, and [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains hp equal to that amount.

Thirst Aura.name: Thirst Aura
Thirst Aura.description:
A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or suffer one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Thirst Aura for the next 24 hours.

Hungry Step.name: Hungry Step
Hungry Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of a creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead.

Limited Magic Immunity.name: Limited Magic Immunity
Limited Magic Immunity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be affected or detected by spells of 2nd level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

Shadow Snare.name: Shadow Snare
Shadow Snare.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], range 20/60 ft. , one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by tendrils of shadow.

A creature, including the restrained creature, can take its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

The tendrils of shadow can be attack and destroyed (AC 12; hp 10; vulnerability to radiant damage; immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage).

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by tendrils of shadow.

Immortal.name: Immortal
Immortal.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it returns to life in [[/r 1d12]] months, regaining all its hp and becoming active again.

The new body appears in a space of the locus’s choice within its bound land.

Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

Material Bound.name: Material Bound
Material Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any spell or effect that would force it to leave the Material Plane, unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] wants to leave. It has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would return it to the Material Plane from another plane of existence.

Plague of Ill Omen.name: Plague of Ill Omen
Plague of Ill Omen.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] radiates a magical aura of misfortune.

A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Active Effects that provide disadvantage on ability saves. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls.

Disadv. Attacks/Saves.name: Disadv. Attacks/Saves
Disadv. Attacks/Saves.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

Shocking Hide.name: Shocking Hide
Shocking Hide.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.condition: When a creature touches the eel

Vomit Swarm.name: Vomit Swarm
Vomit Swarm.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales scarabs in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage and is covered in scarabs.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t covered in scarabs.

A creature covered in scarabs takes [[/damage average activity=cmB7SeenWL0wkYZG]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

A creature, including the covered creature, can take its action to brush the scarabs off the covered creature by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

damage.condition: If a creature is covered in scarabs

check.condition: If a creature is covered in scarabs

affects.special: including the creature covered in scarabs

Patron’s Might.name: Patron’s Might
Patron’s Might.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] channels its patron’s awe-inspiring presence, terrifying those nearby.

Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t frightened.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

Coils.name: Coils
Coils.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 13).

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it can’t breathe, it takes [[/damage average average=8RoH8VG0jYyK41C3]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use its Coils on another target.

Fearsome Gaze.name: Fearsome Gaze
Fearsome Gaze.description: The stare of an [[lookup @name lowercase]] is especially piercing to Humanoids. It has advantage on any Charisma (Intimidation) check it makes against a Humanoid.

Mock the Dying.name: Mock the Dying
Mock the Dying.description: Death saving throws made within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=QiTMaa1AWeZ5l0sr]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have disadvantage.

utility.condition: If target is making death saving throws

Woodland Walk.name: Woodland Walk
Woodland Walk.description: &Reference[Difficult terrain] composed of nonmagical plants doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement, and it can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

Summon Devil.name: Summon Devil
Summon Devil.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 1d4]] giant owls that are Fiends with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s damage resistances and immunities (but not its {TRAIT} trait).

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<=50#A lunar devil is called on a result of 1 instead]]{50 percent chance} of calling one {CREATURE} instead. The called creatures arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its telepathic commands.

The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Chance Lunar Devil is Called.name: Chance Lunar Devil is Called
Chance Lunar Devil is Called.chatFlavor: A lunar devil is called on a result of 1 instead

Blood-Drinking Hair.name: Blood-Drinking Hair
Blood-Drinking Hair.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] drains blood from one creature grappled by her.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains hp equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

save.condition: if a creature is grappled by the hag

Foul Form.name: Foul Form
Foul Form.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s semi-solid form emits poisonous gases.

Any creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}

A creature that succeeds on this saving throw by 5 or more is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Foul Form for the next 24 hours.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

Stone Step.name: Stone Step
Stone Step.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

The origin and destination spaces must contain a stone or rocky surface, such as a cliff face or rocky terrain.

Prophetic Tactics.name: Prophetic Tactics
Prophetic Tactics.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on initiative rolls.

In addition, at the start of each of the cult leader’s turns, one friendly creature within 30 feet of the cult leader has advantage on the first attack roll it makes before the start of the cult leader’s next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an enabled Active Effect (AE) that grants the cult leader advantage on initiative rolls.

There is also an activity that includes an AE that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate advantage on the first attack.

Adv. First Attack Roll.name: Adv. First Attack Roll
Adv. First Attack Roll.description: The target has advantage on the first attack roll it makes before the start of the cult leader’s next turn.

Warping Bolt.name: Warping Bolt
Warping Bolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on attack rolls as reality-warping energies temporarily distort its body.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate disadvantage on attack rolls.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following flaws:

MORE

  • Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire’s heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the stake is removed.

  • Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 10 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that can be enabled in the Effects tab, providing disadvantage on checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls at this time.

Stake to the Heart.name: 桩刺
Stake to the Heart.condition: If the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place

affects.special: The incapacitated vampire in their resting place

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: The incapacitated vampire is &Reference[paralyzed apply=false]{paralyzed} until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Radiant Fists.name: Radiant Fists
Radiant Fists.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Slam]] attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with a Slam attack, the attack deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage (included in the attack).

Powerful Steed.name: Powerful Steed
Powerful Steed.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity and its ability to carry a rider.

Deathly Doom.name: Deathly Doom
Deathly Doom.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically dooms a creature for 1 hour. It can have only one creature doomed at a time. If it dooms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the direction to the doomed creature as long as both are on the same plane of existence.

Static Shock.name: Static Shock
Static Shock.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases built-up electricity in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is also &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} for 1 minute.

A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description:
A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is &Reference[stunned apply=false]{stunned} for 1 minute.

A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Frenzied Rage.name: Frenzied Rage
Frenzied Rage.description:
If a [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its Claws attack and gains a +2 bonus to damage with its Claws until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) can be applied to this actor's selected token in the scene from chat, granting a +2 bonus to the Claw Attack while raging.

Although Advantage on the claw attack is not automated, this AE can also serve as a reminder.

Net Cannon.name: Net Cannon
Net Cannon.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}

A mechanism within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s chest can fire a net with a 20-foot trailing cable anchored within its chest.

A creature, including the restrained creature, can take its action to free the restrained creature by succeeding on a [[/check str 10 format=long]].

Alternatively, dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the creature.

Point Blank Hunter.name: Point Blank Hunter
Point Blank Hunter.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a ranged attack with a bow, it doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.

Discreet Bite.name: Discreet Bite
Discreet Bite.description:
The bite of a [[lookup @name lowercase]] is barely perceptible and the wound is quickly anesthetized.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with a [[/item Bite]] attack, the target must succeed on a [[/check format=long]] to notice the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its attack.

Each time the creature takes acid damage from an attached [[lookup @name lowercase]], it can repeat this check, noticing the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on a success.

A creature that takes acid damage from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while below half its hp maximum automatically succeeds on this check.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a {SIZE} {TYPE}. The swarm can’t regain hp or gain temporary hp.

Merciful Exchange.name: Merciful Exchange
Merciful Exchange.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces a creature to 0 hp with a melee attack, it can cut off one of the creature’s limbs. If it does so, the target is reduced to 1 hp instead.

Constricting Lunge.name: Constricting Lunge
Constricting Lunge.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a [[/item Claw]] attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

If the target is prone, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one [[/item Constrict]] attack against it as a bonus action.

To Hell and Back.name: To Hell and Back
To Hell and Back.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sends one creature it can see within 60 feet of it hurling through Hell.

The target must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

On a success, the target takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity000]] damage as Hell pulls on the creature.

On a failure, the target is @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.w7eitkpD7QQTB6j0.JournalEntryPage.TpkZgLfxCmSndmpb]{incapacitated} and disappears, as it takes a quick trip through the nightmarish landscapes of Hell.

At the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target reappears in the space it previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied space, and takes [[/damage average activity=iTpIIGAmdlxRxgq5]] damage.

affects.special: Returning from their trip to hell

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: On a failure on the save, the target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} and disappears, as it takes a quick trip through the nightmarish landscapes of Hell.

Dreamer’s Sand.name: Dreamer’s Sand
Dreamer’s Sand.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws magical sand in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 10 minutes.

This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or another creature uses an action to wake it.

Searing Flare.name: Searing Flare
Searing Flare.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] intensifies the heat and light it sheds to withering levels.

Each creature in the bright light shed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Blistering Radiance trait must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and doesn’t suffer exhaustion.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: The target suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Limited Telepathy.name: 有限感应
Limited Telepathy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn’t allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

House Guardian.name: House Guardian
House Guardian.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a long rest in a structure with up to 2,500 square feet of floor space, the structure becomes magically protected.

This works like the guards and wards spell, except the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can choose only two effects from the spell to place in the warded area.

Wyrmblood Venom.name: Wyrmblood Venom
Wyrmblood Venom.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits a poisoned creature with a [[/item Bite]] or [[/item Piercing Bones]] attack, the target’s Charisma score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]].

The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} if this reduces its Charisma to 0.

The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

CHA Score -1.name: CHA Score -1
CHA Score -1.description: The target’s Charisma score is reduced by 1. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

CHA Score -2.name: CHA Score -2
CHA Score -2.description: The target’s Charisma score is reduced by 2. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

CHA Score -3.name: CHA Score -3
CHA Score -3.description: The target’s Charisma score is reduced by 3. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

CHA Score -4.name: CHA Score -4
CHA Score -4.description: The target’s Charisma score is reduced by 4. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

Improvised Tools.name: Improvised Tools
Improvised Tools.description:
The kobold [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use any Tiny objects at hand to pick locks and disarm traps, as if any such object was part of a set of @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.woWZ1sO5IUVGzo58]{thieves’ tools}.

It is proficient in using Tiny objects in this way.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on ability checks to pick locks and disarm traps.

Huntsman’s Weapons.name: Huntsman’s Weapons
Huntsman’s Weapons.description: The [[lookup @name]]'s weapon attacks are magical. When he hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 14 (4d6) poison damage (included in the attack).

Fear Aura.name: Fear Aura
Fear Aura.description:
A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the start of its next turn.

On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Fear Aura for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the start of its next turn.

Tempest Breath.name: Tempest Breath
Tempest Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales a blast of stormy wind in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and [[/damage average]] damage and is pushed up to 45 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t pushed or knocked prone.

Nonmagical flames in the area are extinguished.

Planar Traveler.name: Planar Traveler
Planar Traveler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can transport itself to a different plane of existence. This works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.J6Jpw5XzB5aTeqnz]{plane shift} spell, except the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can affect only itself and can’t use this action to banish an unwilling creature to another plane.

Spit Venom.name: Spit Venom
Spit Venom.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} and &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned & Blinded.name: 中毒并目盲
Poisoned & Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} and &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blood Sense.name: Blood Sense
Blood Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of creatures that aren’t Constructs or Undead within 60 feet of her and can sense the general direction of such creatures within 1 mile of her.

Fiery Wing Beat.name: Fiery Wing Beat
Fiery Wing Beat.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] beats their wings, extinguishing mundane and magical light sources.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Elephants’ Bane.name: Elephants’ Bane
Elephants’ Bane.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against elephants.

It can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any elephant or elephant material no older than 48 hours within 120 feet of it.

Swirling Stars.name: Swirling Stars
Swirling Stars.description:
The stars on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s gown pulse with brilliant starlight.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Duelist’s Mobility.name: Duelist’s Mobility
Duelist’s Mobility.description: &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] made against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have disadvantage. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is prone at the start of its turn, it can immediately stand without costing movement.

Hive Bond.name: Hive Bond
Hive Bond.description:
While the spawn is within 60 feet of at least one member of its hive, it has advantage on initiative rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

The spawn can’t be surprised if at least one other member of its hive is aware of the danger and within 300 feet of it.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect (AE) that will grant advantage on Perception checks and Initiative rolls. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

utility.condition: If within 60 feet of one member of its hive

range.special: of at least one member of its hive

Hive Bond.name: Hive Bond
Hive Bond.description: While the spawn is within 60 feet of at least one member of its hive, it has advantage on initiative rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

Sand Shroud.name: Sand Shroud
Sand Shroud.description:
A miniature sandstorm constantly whirls around the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in a 10-foot radius.

This area is lightly obscured to creatures other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Wisdom (Survival) checks made to follow tracks left by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or other creatures that were traveling in its sand shroud are made with disadvantage.

Sure Seat.name: Sure Seat
Sure Seat.description: While mounted and not incapacitated, the [[lookup @name]] can’t be knocked prone, dismounted, or moved against his will.

Quiet Wings.name: Quiet Wings
Quiet Wings.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide while flying.

Springspike Shield.name: Springspike Shield
Springspike Shield.description:
When the kobold [[lookup @name lowercase]] is wielding its shield and is hit by a melee attack within 5 feet of it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fire one of its shield spikes at the attacker.

The attacker takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Gore.name: 角刺
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Thirsting Kiss.name: Thirsting Kiss
Thirsting Kiss.description: Melee Spell Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. , one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], incapacitated, or restrained. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains temporary hp equal to half that amount.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]进行依赖嗅觉的感知（察觉）检定时具有优势。

Keen Hearing and Sight.name: 敏锐视听
Keen Hearing and Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Void Warping.name: Void Warping
Void Warping.description:
The area around the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is warped by its connection to the Void.

A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

Half Speed.name: 速度减半
Half Speed.description: The target's speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

Enchanted Weapons.name: Enchanted Weapons
Enchanted Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 force damage (included in the attack).

Explosive Core.name: Explosive Core
Explosive Core.description:
The mechanism that powers the [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes when the Construct is destroyed.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when it is destroyed must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Protective Embrace.name: Protective Embrace
Protective Embrace.description:
When a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see attacks a creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can briefly wrap itself around the creature in its space.

The creature in its space takes only half the damage from the attack, and the cloak takes the other half.

Straight Razor.name: Straight Razor
Straight Razor.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Instead of dealing damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can steal one item the target is wearing or carrying, provided the item weighs no more than 10 pounds, isn’t a weapon, and isn’t wrapped around or firmly attached to the target, such as a shirt or armor.

Absorb the Dead.name: Absorb the Dead
Absorb the Dead.description:
Whenever a Large or smaller creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead dies within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], that creature’s remains join with the mound, and the mound regains hp equal to twice the CR or level of the absorbed creature.
