The absorbed creature can’t be returned to life by any spell or effect that requires a body, unless the body is retrieved from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Corrupted Kiss.name: Corrupted Kiss
Corrupted Kiss.description: Melee Spell Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. , one willing creature, or a creature that is incapacitated or restrained. [[/damage average extended]].

Radial Eyes.name: Radial Eyes
Radial Eyes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on saving throws against being blinded.

In addition, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t blinded, creatures attacking it can’t benefit from traits and features that rely on a creature’s allies distracting or surrounding the [[lookup @name lowercase]], such as the Pack Tactics trait or Sneak Attack class feature.

Eldritch Understanding.name: Eldritch Understanding
Eldritch Understanding.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can read and use any spell scroll or magic item, ignoring all class, race, and level requirements.

Detect Lies.name: Detect Lies
Detect Lies.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie and can pinpoint the location of a creature within 60 feet of it that lied within the last minute.

Shifting Camouflage.name: Shifting Camouflage
Shifting Camouflage.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hide adapts to its current surroundings.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in nonmagical, natural terrain.

Treasure Sense.name: Treasure Sense
Treasure Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

Fling.name: 抛掷术
Fling.description:
One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take the same damage and be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Foundry Note

Scaling for the Damage activity is available to set the damage value, with each scaling value corresponding to 5 feet of movement. For example, a value of 1 represents 10 feet, 2 represents 20 feet, and so on.

save.condition: If the grappled target is flung into another creature

affects.special: That the grappled target is flung at

Danger Sense.name: 危机感应
Danger Sense.description: While conscious, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Heated Body.name: Heated Body
Heated Body.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Cast Iron Stomach.name: Cast Iron Stomach
Cast Iron Stomach.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Unnerving Gaze.name: Unnerving Gaze
Unnerving Gaze.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or have disadvantage on the next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes before the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the benefits above.

Disadvantage.name: 劣势
Disadvantage.description: The target has disadvantage on the next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes before the start of the automaton's next turn.

Blinding Demise.name: Blinding Demise
Blinding Demise.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces a creature to 0 hp, it can blind the creature permanently. If it does so, the creature is reduced to 1 hp instead.

Shadesight.name: Shadesight
Shadesight.description: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s darkvision.

Storm Glide.name: Storm Glide
Storm Glide.description:
During storms with ample rain or lightning, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a flying speed equal to its swimming speed.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) can be found on the Effects tab that adds flying speed to the character sheet.

Death’s Embrace.name: Death’s Embrace
Death’s Embrace.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 0 ft. , one creature in the swarm’s space. Hit: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Until this grapple ends, the creature is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and any attack against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<=50#The grappled creature is hit on a result of 1]]{50 percent chance} of hitting the grappled creature instead.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature grappled at a time. The grappled creature has advantage on ability checks made to escape the grapple when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has half of its hp or fewer.

Is the Grappled Creature Hit?.name: Is the Grappled Creature Hit?
Is the Grappled Creature Hit?.chatFlavor: The grappled creature is hit on a result of 1

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Until this grapple ends, the creature is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} .

Bind.name: 铐捆
Bind.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses a creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it that has an Intelligence of 6 or higher.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] psychically binds itself to the target.

If the target succeeds on the saving throw by 5 or more, it knows the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attempted to bind to it. Otherwise, the target is unaware of the attempt.

While bound to the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the creature has resistance to psychic damage, but it has disadvantage on saving throws against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Compulsion]].

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can be bound to only one target at a time. If it binds to another, the effect on the previous target ends.

Bound.name: 连接
Bound.description: The target has resistance to psychic damage while bound to them.

Blinding Gaze.name: Blinding Gaze
Blinding Gaze.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fixes their gaze on a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her.

If the target can see the beauty’s eyes, the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=falses]{blinded} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Blinding Gaze for the next 24 hours.

Putrid Stench.name: Putrid Stench
Putrid Stench.description: A creature that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

Locked Saddle.name: Locked Saddle
Locked Saddle.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be knocked prone, dismounted, or moved against its will while mounted.

Moon Bolt.name: Moon Bolt
Moon Bolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

If the target is a creature in a form other than its true form, it takes an extra [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage and must succeed on a [[/save format=dnd5eactivity100]] or revert to its true form.

affects.special: Creature not in its true form

Sheds Light.name: Sheds Light
Sheds Light.description: The target sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

Poison Breath.name: Poison Breath
Poison Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales a cone of black, poisonous gas in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each target in that area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until cured by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until cured.

Delight.name: Delight
Delight.description: When a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes psychic damage, the strife gains [[/heal]] or gains advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

Water Mastery.name: Water Mastery
Water Mastery.description:
A [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls if both it and its target are touching the same body of water.

If the target and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are both on dry ground, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls.

Confounding Ugliness.name: Confounding Ugliness
Confounding Ugliness.description:
Any Humanoid that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s true form must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

If the Humanoid’s saving throw is successful, it is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Confounding Ugliness for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is &Reference[surprise]{surprised} or the revelation of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the Humanoid does so, it can’t see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

If the Humanoid looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

Venomous Fist.name: Venomous Fist
Venomous Fist.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity100]] or be cursed.

Every 24 hours that elapse, the cursed target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=hqLXpLRWRKHSn2jn]] or take [[/damage average activity=hqLXpLRWRKHSn2jn]] damage, and its hp maximum is reduced by that amount.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest after the curse is removed. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

The curse lasts until removed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse} spell or similar magic.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: The target is cursed. Every 24 hours that elapse, the cursed target must succeed on a saving throw or they take damage and their hp maximum is reduced by that amount.

Shredded Breath.name: Shredded Breath
Shredded Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales sharp shreds of paper in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t blinded.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Poisonous Blood.name: Poisonous Blood
Poisonous Blood.description: A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Chieftain’s Presence.name: Chieftain’s Presence
Chieftain’s Presence.description: Dragons and kobolds within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t be charmed or frightened.

Sepulchral Scrying.name: Sepulchral Scrying
Sepulchral Scrying.description:
While within 1 mile of its burial mound, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an invisible sensor within 5 miles of the mound for 1 minute.

When it uses this bonus action and as a bonus action on each of its turns for the duration, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can switch between using its own senses and projecting its senses through the sensor.

While projecting its senses through the sensor, it can see, hear, telepathically communicate, and cast spells as if it was in the sensor’s space, and it is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[deafened apply=false]{deafened} with regard to its own senses.

The sensor can be dispelled (DC 14).

Blinded & Deafened.name: 目盲并耳聋
Blinded & Deafened.description: The haugbui is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[deafened apply=false]{deafened} with regard to its own senses, while projecting its senses through the sensor.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: The target suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Turning Defiance.name: Turning Defiance
Turning Defiance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and any undead within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=s1GyVPyhcSTuqCzM]] feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

Two Heads.name: Two Heads
Two Heads.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Oasis Appearance.name: Oasis Appearance
Oasis Appearance.description:
While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless and partially submerged on the surface of sand or soil, it is indistinguishable from a small oasis or pond.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s pitcher produces enough water for plants to grow around it, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains in the area for an extended period of time.

A creature that eats a fruit from a plant growing in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s water is affected by the [[/item Sweet Water]] trait as if it drank the water.

Void Shape.name: Void Shape
Void Shape.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically transforms into a dark purple, Void ghost form or back into its Undead form.

Its statistics, other than its speed, resistances, and immunities, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying changes with it. It reverts to its Undead form if it dies.

False Tongue.name: False Tongue
False Tongue.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks.

In addition, magical attempts to discern lies always report that the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s words are true, and it can’t be magically forced to tell the truth.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) to grant advantage on deception checks is enabled on the Effects tab of the character sheet.

Storm’s Strength.name: Storm’s Strength
Storm’s Strength.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is outside and an electrical storm is within 1 mile of it, creatures have disadvantage on their saving throws against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Lightning’s Kiss]].

Pacify.name: Pacify
Pacify.description:
A friendly creature that has interacted peacefully with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in its whelp form can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must be able to hear the creature, who must take an action to make a [[/check format=long]].

If the check succeeds, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] transforms back into its whelp form on its next turn and stops attacking.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage before then, it remains in its hulking form and continues attacking.

Spiked Gauntlet.name: Spiked Gauntlet
Spiked Gauntlet.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

affects.special: If the target is a Large or smaller creature

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the are knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Freedom of Movement.name: 行动自如
Freedom of Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores &Reference[difficult terrain], and magical effects can’t reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

Scorpion Walk.name: Scorpion Walk
Scorpion Walk.description: &Reference[Difficult terrain] composed of sand or gravel doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement. In addition, while in sandy terrain, she doesn’t leave tracks and has &Reference[tremorsense] out to a range of 30 feet.

Tremorsense 30 ft..name: Tremorsense 30 ft.
Tremorsense 30 ft..description: While in sandy terrain, she doesn’t leave tracks and has tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet.

Ruff Spikes.name: Ruff Spikes
Ruff Spikes.description:
When a creature moves to a space within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the dragon flares its many feelers and spikes.

The creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage and be prevented from entering that space.

save.condition: When a creature moves to a space within 10 feet of the cave dragon

Glitter Dust.name: Glitter Dust
Glitter Dust.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats her wings and creates a cloud of glittering, golden particles.

Each non-tosculi creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of her must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Bone Spur.name: Bone Spur
Bone Spur.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] impales the target on one of its bone spurs, &Reference[grappling apply=false]{grappling} the target (escape DC 16).

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than two creatures impaled at a time.

oQTqnPwmRQ8Kkeba.name: 诡刺
oQTqnPwmRQ8Kkeba.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failure, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=Ibj9UP1IEf3GXJVM]] damage. On a success, the condition ends.

When @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]{animate dead} is cast on one or more creatures killed by this poison, the spellcaster requires no material components and can cast the spell as an action.

save.condition: On a hit

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. A poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

Whiptail Stinger.name: Whiptail Stinger
Whiptail Stinger.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity100]] or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage and be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

While poisoned, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=vzjhVMU0Yox23EO8]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

save.condition: On a hit

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒} 1 分钟。

Plane Bound.name: Plane Bound
Plane Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any spell or effect that would force it to leave its current plane, unless it wants to leave.

Hell’s Servitors.name: Hell’s Servitors
Hell’s Servitors.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls 1d4 devils with a challenge rating of 4 or lower, or it calls 1 devil with a challenge rating of 6 or lower.

The called Fiends arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its spoken commands.

The Fiends remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

Ram.name: 攻城槌
Ram.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

If the charger moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw.

Mephitic Claw (Giant Hyena or Hybrid For.name: Mephitic Claw (Giant Hyena or Hybrid Form Only)
Mephitic Claw (Giant Hyena or Hybrid For.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

Keen Hearing and Smell.name: 敏锐嗅听觉
Keen Hearing and Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Sleeping Song.name: Sleeping Song
Sleeping Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody.

Every Humanoid and Giant within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear the song must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} until the song ends.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop [[lookup @name lowercase]] at any time. The song ends if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is incapacitated.

An unconscious target wakes if it takes damage or if another creature uses an action to wake it.

A target that successfully saves is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s song for the next 24 hours.

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: The target falls &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} until the song ends.

Unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
Unstoppable.description: Moving through &Reference[difficult terrain] doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement, and its speed can’t be reduced.

Plant Camouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
Plant Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

Hunter’s Quarry.name: Hunter’s Quarry
Hunter’s Quarry.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically calls [[/r 3d6]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.55PkbskG5iBZGrgR]{elk} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.lZR4lhNmYSf89s4Q]{boars}, [[/r 1d4]] giant @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.lZR4lhNmYSf89s4Q]{boars} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.hQt3qIahnB1Odb40]{giant elk}, or 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.jLPhaBnMtAbB5dp1]{elephant}.

The called Beasts arrive in [[/r 1d4]] rounds, acting as allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and obeying its spoken commands.

The Beasts remain for 1 hour, until the [[lookup @name]] dies, or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses them as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have any number of Beasts under its control at one time provided the combined total CR of the Beasts is no higher than 8.

Demigod’s Vitality.name: Demigod’s Vitality
Demigod’s Vitality.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s ability scores and hp maximum can’t be reduced except by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell.

Poisonous Riposte.name: Poisonous Riposte
Poisonous Riposte.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must see the attacker.

If this effect causes the attack to miss, the attacker takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available to add the bonus AC to this character sheet. It can be activated on the Effects tab of the character sheet.

Water Siphon.name: Water Siphon
Water Siphon.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against creatures made of or gaining power from magical water, such as water elementals, water jinnborn, water genies, and sorcerers with water-based origins.

In addition, such creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Draining Touch]] and [[/item Multiattack]].

Snow Camouflage.name: Snow Camouflage
Snow Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Venom-Soaked Wraps.name: Venom-Soaked Wraps
Venom-Soaked Wraps.description: A creature that touches the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or hits it with a melee attack while within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Shellycoat’s Fog.name: Shellycoat’s Fog
Shellycoat’s Fog.description:
While in contact with water, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] of fog centered on a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it for 1 minute.

The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured.

A creature that enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} and unable to breathe, unless it can breathe water, for 1 minute.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} and unable to breathe, unless it can breathe water, for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Umbral Grasp.name: Umbral Grasp
Umbral Grasp.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sends a giant hand of shadow to grab one creature it can see that is in dim light or darkness within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by wisps of magical shadow for 1 minute.

While restrained, the target takes [[/damage average average=li7hTFvj9AMfDI7L]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than two creatures restrained by its Umbral Grasp at a time.

affects.special: Restrained by the the umbral grasp

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by wisps of magical shadow for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Smoke Shroud.name: Smoke Shroud
Smoke Shroud.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a cloud of dark smoke within 5 feet of himself.

The area is lightly obscured to all except [[lookup @name lowercase]], and each non-devil creature that starts its turn in the smoke must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its turn.

At the start of each of his turns, [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses whether this shroud is active.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its turn.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in object or terrain form, the target is subjected to the mimic’s [[/item Adhesive]] trait.

Steam Blast.name: Steam Blast
Steam Blast.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a blast of steam in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=IporwrpKwcLAm6fA]]-foot-radius cloud that extends from it, spreading around corners.

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Divine Animosity.name: Divine Animosity
Divine Animosity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on attack rolls against creatures wielding divine or celestial power, such as clerics, paladins, or aasimars.

Drain Life.name: 吸取生命
Drain Life.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken from this attack, and [[lookup @name]] regains an equal number of hit points.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

save.condition: When hit

Impaling Leg.name: Impaling Leg
Impaling Leg.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 16).

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and takes [[/damage average activity=CprZiSqCQikhWwkc]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use the same Impaling Leg on another target.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has four Impaling Legs.

damage.condition: If grappled and restrained by the spider

affects.special: Grappled and restrained by the spider

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}.

Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and takes damage at the start of each of its turns.

Shadow Shape.name: Shadow Shape
Shadow Shape.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically transforms into a Large shadow or back into its true form, which is a Fiend. Its statistics are the same in each form.

Any equipment it is wearing or carrying transforms with it.

It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Strangling Grasp.name: Strangling Grasp
Strangling Grasp.description:
Each creature grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and can’t breathe until the grapple ends.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and can still breathe.

Foundry Note

If a situation prevents a character from breathing, the D&D 5e rules for suffocation apply. A creature can hold its breath for minutes equal to 1 + its Constitution modifier (minimum 30 seconds).

Once they run out of breath or are actively choking, they can survive for rounds equal to their Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round). After that time, the creature drops to 0 hit points and is dying, and cannot regain hit points until it can breathe again.

However, it is up to you to adjudicate the situation that makes sense for your encounter.

save.condition: If grappled by the attacking creature

Can't Breath.name: Can't Breath
Can't Breath.description: At the attacking creature grips you tighter, you are unable to breath.

Tenacious Stride.name: Tenacious Stride
Tenacious Stride.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to his speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

If he is mounted, he can force the mount to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks instead.

Swarming.name: Swarming
Swarming.description: Up to two [[lookup @name lowercase]] can share the same space at the same time. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on melee attack rolls if it is sharing its space with another [[lookup @name lowercase]] that isn’t incapacitated.

Lair Actions.name: Lair Actions
Lair Actions.description: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use the same effect two rounds in a row.

Snare Walker.name: Snare Walker
Snare Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by its snares or the snares of other [[lookup @name lowercase]].

White Ghost Shivers.name: White Ghost Shivers
White Ghost Shivers.description:
A creature that eats the meat of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or that is bitten by a creature infected with the white ghost shivers disease must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become infected with the &Reference[disease]{disease}. An infected creature develops the first symptoms after 24 hours.

Symptoms include a mild chill that escalates to a fever and frightful hallucinations that give the disease its name.

At the end of each long rest, the infected creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or suffer one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}

The exhaustion lasts until the creature finishes a long rest after the disease is cured.

A creature that succeeds on two saving throws against the disease recovers from it.

Alternatively, the disease can be removed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.

Save: Infection.name: Save: Infection
Save: Infection.condition: Target eats the meat of a bone crab

Diseased.name: Diseased
Diseased.description:
An infected creature develops the first symptoms of White Ghose Shivers

Symptoms include a mild chill that escalates to a fever and frightful hallucinations that give the disease its name.

At the end of each long rest, the infected creature must succeed on a saving throw.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: After failing a save after a long rest, you gain one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Move.name: Move
Move.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Ice Climb.name: Ice Climb
Ice Climb.description: When climbing on ice, the [[lookup @name]] has a climbing speed of 20 feet, and she can climb difficult surfaces made of ice and snow, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Snapping Jaws.name: Snapping Jaws
Snapping Jaws.description: A creature that attempts to move out of or through the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or take [[/damage average]] damage.

Flood Blast.name: Flood Blast
Flood Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be pushed up to 30 feet away from the [[lookup @name]] and knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Water Hypersusceptibility.name: Water Hypersusceptibility
Water Hypersusceptibility.description:
For every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage activity=x10PcqVEr1tkVyF6]] damage when it starts its turn at least partially submerged in water.

Foundry Note

Scaling for the Damage: Moving In Water activity is available, with each scaling value corresponding to 5 feet of movement. For example, a value of 1 represents 5 feet or 1 gallon, 2 represents 10 feet or 2 gallons, and so on.

Magical Light Sensitivity.name: Magical Light Sensitivity
Magical Light Sensitivity.description:
While in an area of light created by a spell or other magical effect, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that sets all ability checks to roll at disadvantage. Currently, automation to apply disadvantage on attack rolls is unavailable, but the AE can act as a reminder.

Magical Light Sensitivity.name: Magical Light Sensitivity
Magical Light Sensitivity.description: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Hungry Dead Nature.name: Hungry Dead Nature
Hungry Dead Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] requires no air or sleep.

Shadow Touch.name: Shadow Touch
Shadow Touch.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Strength score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]].

The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

A non-evil Humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.QGcQYZbVl4bWzi4E]{shadow} under the vampire’s control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life.

The vampire can have no more than five shadows under its control at one time.

Shadow Rises.name: 唤起暗影
Shadow Rises.condition: If the target died after its Strength score was reduced to 0

affects.special: A creature that died after their Strength was reduced to 0

Riparian Weapons.name: Riparian Weapons
Riparian Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When he hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 10 (3d6) poison damage (included in the attack).

Hidden Eye.name: Hidden Eye
Hidden Eye.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being blinded.

Protect Me.name: Protect Me
Protect Me.description:
When a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see targets it with an attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can sidestep behind an ally within 5 feet of it, moving to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the ally.

The chosen ally becomes the target of the attack instead.

utility.condition: When a creature the N{PC can see targets it with an attack

Grasping Claw.name: Grasping Claw
Grasping Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC 17) if it is a Large or smaller creature.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has four Grasping Claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Fog Step.name: Fog Step
Fog Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The origin and destination spaces must contain fog.

Bleeding Bite.name: Bleeding Bite
Bleeding Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature other than a Construct or Undead, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or lose [[/damage average activity=F6sECAL2cm9KLw7o]] hp at the start of each of its turns due to a bleeding wound. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful [[/check format=long]].

The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

affects.special: other than a Construct or Undead
other than a Construct or Undead

Siphon Magic.name: Siphon Magic
Siphon Magic.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] siphons magic from a spellcaster it is grappling.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or lose one spell slot of the highest level it can cast.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then regains an expended use of its Spellcasting.

Corruption’s Bond.name: Corruption’s Bond
Corruption’s Bond.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature whose fate it has corrupted.

In addition, it can pinpoint the location of any such creature, as well as sense the creature’s general state of health.

These effects function even if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and the creature are on different planes of existence.

Spearhead.name: Spearhead
Spearhead.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least [[lookup @range.value activity=IIWsrQAo8vksHGJS]] feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a [[/item Bite]] attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Coldfire Weapons.name: Coldfire Weapons
Coldfire Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are imbued with blue fey fire and magical.

When the champion hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 cold damage or fire damage (included in the attack), the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice.

Poisoned Weapons.name: Poisoned Weapons
Poisoned Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapons are coated with a magical poison harvested from the forest.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 poison damage (included in the attack).

Hidden Soul.name: Hidden Soul
Hidden Soul.description:
A creature holding the egg containing [[lookup @name]]'s soul can use an action to compel Koschei as if a @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.eEpy1ONlXumKS1mp]{Dominate Monster} spell were cast on him and [[lookup @name]] failed his saving throw.

As long as the soul is within the needle, [[lookup @name]] can’t permanently die.

If he is killed, his body reforms in his lair in [[/r 1d10]] days. If the needle is broken, [[lookup @name]] can be killed like any other creature.

Mind-Rending Death.name: Mind-Rending Death
Mind-Rending Death.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it releases all the fear it consumed in its lifetime in a single, mind-rending wave.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

damage.condition: If frightened of the attacking creature

Frightening.name: 恐慌之音
Frightening.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Expel Vermin.name: Expel Vermin
Expel Vermin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] vomits forth the leeches, stinging insects, and other swamp vermin infesting its innards in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t poisoned.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description:
The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for 1 minute.

A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Woodfriend.name: Woodfriend
Woodfriend.description: When in a forest, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves no tracks and automatically discerns true north.

Frightening Cut.name: Frightening Cut
Frightening Cut.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Straight Razor]] attack against a creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=SEcHIzkIitat4qiO]] feet of it.

If the attack hits and deals damage, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage, and each creature that can see the attack within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

An attack activity is available on this feature to perform a Straight Razor attack. If you prefer the Straight Razor item, feel free to use it. The link above will initiate the Straight Razor action.

save.condition: If the Straight Razor attack hits and deals damage

affects.special: Each creature that can see the attack within 15 feet of the target

Additional Damage.name: Additional Damage
Additional Damage.condition: If a single straight razor attack hits and deals damage using this feature

affects.special: Hit by a single Straight Razor attack made from this feature

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Disorienting Gaze.name: Disorienting Gaze
Disorienting Gaze.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] locks eyes with one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it.

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} 1 minute.

While incapacitated, the creature moves in a random direction when it moves.

An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Disorienting Gaze for the next 24 hours.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description:
The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} 1 minute.

While incapacitated, the creature moves in a random direction when it moves.

An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic animal sounds.

A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful [[/check format]].

Heated Weapons.name: Heated Weapons
Heated Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 fire damage (included in the attack).

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.description:
While attached to a creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extends a tendril of poisonous gas down the creature’s throat.

The creature must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, it takes [[/damage average]] damage, immediately runs out of breath, and begins &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating}.

On a success, it takes half the damage, doesn’t run out of breath, and isn’t suffocating.

Suffocation ends if the creature dies, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is removed from the creature, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is killed.

A suffocating creature that fails this saving throw reduces its remaining rounds of breath by 1.

Sufficating.name: Sufficating
Sufficating.description:
The target immediately runs out of breath, and begins &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating}.

Suffocation ends if the attacking creature dies, if it is removed from the target, or if the attacking creature is killed.

Transparent Trap.name: Transparent Trap
Transparent Trap.description:
With 10 minutes of work, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a web of nearly transparent snares in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7zUJoLE3G1PVgMBR]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=7zUJoLE3G1PVgMBR]].

The web must be anchored between two solid masses or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling. A web of snares layered over a flat surface has a depth of 5 feet.

The web is difficult terrain, and the snares forming it are nearly transparent, requiring a successful [[/check format=long activity=pmxvBHgyPdx3OvgY]] to notice them.

A creature that starts its turn in the web of snares or enters the web during its turn must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by the sticky snares.

A creature restrained by the snares can use its action to free itself by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=r0T0TL5npkRW7xal]].

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by the sticky snares.

Storm Sight.name: Storm Sight
Storm Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see through areas obscured by fog, mist, clouds, or precipitation.

Psychically Bound.name: Psychically Bound
Psychically Bound.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must be psychically bound to a creature to survive.

It loses 5 ([[/r 2d4]]) hp for every hour it is not bound to a creature or every hour it is more than 30 feet away from its bound creature.

HP Loss.name: HP Loss
HP Loss.condition: Every hour it is not bound to a creature or every hour it is more than 30 feet away from its bound creature.

Sand Glide.name: Sand Glide
Sand Glide.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical, loose sand without disturbing the material it is moving through.

Bursting Pod.name: Bursting Pod
Bursting Pod.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and each creature within 5 feet of the target, including the target, must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity100]], taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

tbZG45gow4f1RrV0.name: Call Blood
tbZG45gow4f1RrV0.description:
Each creature with blood within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then gains temporary hp equal to the single highest amount of necrotic damage dealt.

A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more also suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: The target suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Improvised Weapon.name: 临时武器
Improvised Weapon.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], depending on the weapon.

Hazesight.name: Hazesight
Hazesight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see through areas obscured by fog, smoke, and steam without penalty.

Nimbus of Swirling Stars.name: Nimbus of Swirling Stars
Nimbus of Swirling Stars.description: At the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=0LyNK7GFNmQDKU2o]] feet of it and that can see it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated} until the end of its next turn.

Horrific Doppeling.name: Horrific Doppeling
Horrific Doppeling.description:
Characterized by the growing and sloughing off of tumors shaped like the infected creature, horrific doppeling is a disease that infects creatures attacked by [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Until the disease is cured, the creature is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

At the end of each long rest, the infected creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or shed a tumor that looks like a Tiny version of itself.

Though disturbing, the tumor is merely a mass of shed skin and fat that decays as normal.

The disease is cured after the creature succeeds on two saving throws.

Diseased & Poisoned.name: Diseased & Poisoned
Diseased & Poisoned.description: Until the disease is cured, the target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned}.

Life Drain.name: Life Drain
Life Drain.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.

This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

Bog Spew.name: Bog Spew
Bog Spew.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spews a noxious stream of bog filth mixed with stomach acid at one creature it can see within 20 feet of it.

The target must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage and is &Reference[blinded apply=blind]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

On a success, the target takes half the damage and isn’t blinded.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=blind]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Alchemical Fireball.name: Alchemical Fireball
Alchemical Fireball.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel.

Each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when it is destroyed must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

This explosion doesn’t occur if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.

Shared Rage.name: Shared Rage
Shared Rage.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t speak with its creator telepathically, but it can magically receive simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically from its creator while within 100 feet of its creator.

The creator can send the [[lookup @name lowercase]] an image of a creature and emotion or simple idea tied to it, such as anger or retrieval, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] will seek the creature to carry out the emotion or desire.

As long as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is following such an order, it can be more than 100 feet away from its master without wailing.

Alchemical Vapors.name: Alchemical Vapors
Alchemical Vapors.description:
The kobold [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases alchemical vapors pleasing to draconic senses and unpleasant to all others.

Each creature that isn’t a dragonborn or kobold within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Each dragonborn and kobold within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has resistance to damage of the type determined by [[/item Apothecary]] for 1 minute.

affects.special: that is a dragonborn or kobold

Acid Damage Resistance.name: Acid Damage Resistance
Acid Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to acid damage.

Cold Damage Resistance.name: Cold Damage Resistance
Cold Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to cold damage.

Fire Damage Resistance.name: Fire Damage Resistance
Fire Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to fire damage.

Lighting Damage Resistance.name: Lighting Damage Resistance
Lighting Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to lighting damage.

Poison Damage Resistance.name: 毒素伤害抗性
Poison Damage Resistance.description: The alchemist has resistance to poison damage.

Master of Disguise.name: Master of Disguise
Master of Disguise.description: A [[lookup @name lowercase]] in a prepared disguise has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks made to pass as a living creature. While using this ability, it loses its Stench.

Fiendish Cunning.name: Fiendish Cunning
Fiendish Cunning.description:
When a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet of it casts a spell that appears on the cleric or paladin spell list, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can counter the spell with a successful ability check.

This works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]{Counterspell} spell with a +5 spellcasting ability check, except the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make the ability check no matter the level of the spell.

Ever Connected.name: Ever Connected
Ever Connected.description:
[[lookup @name]] are magically connected.

Damage taken by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is split evenly between the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its paired [[lookup @name lowercase]].

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] that was the original target of the attack takes any damage that won’t divide evenly.

All other effects, such as reducing ability scores or being the target of a bless spell, affect only the target.

Shadow Traveler.name: Shadow Traveler
Shadow Traveler.description:
While in shadows, dim light, or darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears into the darkness and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet.

A tendril of inky smoke appears at the origin and destination when it uses this bonus action.

Encourage Dreams.name: Encourage Dreams
Encourage Dreams.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] encourages powerful dreams in the minds of up to three unconscious creatures it can see within 30 feet of it.

Each target must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw.

On a failure, nightmares fill the target’s mind, and the target takes [[/save format=long]] damage, wakes from its sleep, and is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

On a success, pleasant dreams fill the target’s mind, and the target regains [[/heal average]] and can choose to remain unconscious or awaken.

A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

save.condition: Targets must be unconscious

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Silt Cloud.name: Silt Cloud
Silt Cloud.description:
When it takes damage while underwater and within 5 feet of the bottom of a body of water, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] stirs up a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] of silt centered on it.

The silt spreads around corners, and its area is &Reference[heavily obscured]. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong current disperses it.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then swim up to half its speed. The cloud of silt doesn’t move with the glass gator.

Slick Spittle.name: Slick Spittle
Slick Spittle.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] covers the ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=dnd5eactivity000]] centered on a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it with its slippery spittle.

Each creature standing in that area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}

A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

The spittle remains on the ground for 1 minute.

Fiendish Weapons.name: Fiendish Weapons
Fiendish Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 cold damage (included in the attack).

Air Form.name: Air Form
Air Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Arctic Hunter.name: Arctic Hunter
Arctic Hunter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain. In addition, it has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight in snowy terrain.

Shadow’s Vigil.name: Shadow’s Vigil
Shadow’s Vigil.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks, and magical darkness doesn’t impede the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s darkvision.

Red Cap.name: Red Cap
Red Cap.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must soak its cap in the blood of a Humanoid that has been dead for no more than 1 hour at least once every 3 days.

Every 24 hours past the third day that it goes without soaking its cap in blood in this way, it suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

This exhaustion can be reduced only when the redcap finishes a long rest after soaking its cap in fresh Humanoid blood, which reduces its exhaustion level to 0.

If the redcap dies as a result of this exhaustion, it crumbles to dust.

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: The red cap suffers one level of &Reference[exhaustion apply=false]{exhaustion}.

Cold Regeneration.name: Cold Regeneration
Cold Regeneration.description:
If it starts its turn in an area with below freezing temperature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/heal]].

If the beli takes fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and it doesn’t regenerate.

Reptilian Affinity.name: Reptilian Affinity
Reptilian Affinity.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] never willingly attacks a reptilian Humanoid, such as a lizardfolk or dragonborn, unless attacked first.

If magically forced to attack such a creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls against it.

This trait doesn’t function if the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s rider or tamer directs it to attack.

Ethereal Sight.name: 缥缈视域
Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

Ghost Wings.name: Ghost Wings
Ghost Wings.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] furiously “beats” a set of phantasmal wings.

Each creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the start of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the start of its next turn.

Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.description:
While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is conscious and wearing no armor and wielding no shield, it adds its Wisdom modifier to its Armor Class (included in AC).

In addition, it has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Frightful Roar.name: Frightful Roar
Frightful Roar.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] lets out a blood-curdling roar.

Each hostile creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that can hear the roar must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} until the end of its next turn.

Eject Spores.name: Eject Spores
Eject Spores.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ejects one of the following types of spores at one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=XmfhgNLKbrBt8SEE]] feet of it:

  • Deathcap Spores. The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=XmfhgNLKbrBt8SEE]] or be poisoned for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

  • Slumber Spores. The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=PaWQ2QpJVh0iKZkb]] or fall unconscious for 1 minute. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target is poisoned for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: The target falls unconscious for 1 minute. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Use Magic Item.name: Use Magic Item
Use Magic Item.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] activates a magic item in its possession and can ignore all class, race, and level requirements on the item.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

On a success, the item activates normally.

On a failure, the item doesn’t activate and can’t be used again until the next dawn.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it causes a magical backlash. Each creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], including the [[lookup @name lowercase]], must make a [[/save format=long activity=q1GHTrgUa7imqOio]], taking [[/damage average activity=q1GHTrgUa7imqOio]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Battle Frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
Battle Frenzy.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on all attack rolls it makes while it is below 30 hp.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the above activity.

Adv. Attack Rolls.name: Adv. Attack Rolls
Adv. Attack Rolls.description: The creature has advantage on all attack rolls it makes while it is below 30 hp.

Water Camouflage.name: Water Camouflage
Water Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide while at least half of its body is submerged in water.

Darkness Aura.name: Darkness Aura
Darkness Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits magical darkness in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] around it. The darkness moves with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and spreads around corners. Darkvision can’t penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it.

If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 4th level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses whether this aura is active.

A successful @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{dispel magic} (DC 15) cast on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suppresses this aura for 1 minute.

Night Journey.name: Night Journey
Night Journey.description:
When outdoors at night, the distance of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s vision is not limited by nonmagical darkness.

Once per month, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can declare it is on a night journey, and for the next 24 hours, it can Teleport as a bonus action.

When on a night journey, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport as often as it wants, and its destination must always be in an area of nonmagical darkness within its line of sight.

At any point during the night journey, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use a bonus action to return itself and its rider to the location where it began the night journey.

Rubbery Body.name: Rubbery Body
Rubbery Body.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s body is rubbery with few bones, allowing it to easily move through any opening large enough for a Medium creature. It can squeeze through any opening large enough for a Small creature. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s destination must still have suitable room to accommodate its volume.

Slither.name: Slither
Slither.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hasn’t eaten a Huge creature in the last 24 hours, it can easily move through any open large enough for a Large creature, and it can squeeze through any opening large enough for a Medium creature.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s destination must still have suitable room to accommodate its volume.

Variable Illumination.name: 多变照明
Variable Illumination.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can alter the radius as a bonus action.

Foundry Note

The creature's illumination is set at the smallest radius by default.

Towering Strength.name: Towering Strength
Towering Strength.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is considered to be a Gargantuan giant for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Expert Void Traveler.name: Expert Void Traveler
Expert Void Traveler.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, drink, sleep, or ambient pressure. While traveling in the Void, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically glides on solar winds, covering immense distances in short times.

Shadow Sight.name: 暗影视界
Shadow Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made while in dim light or darkness, and magical darkness doesn’t impede the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s darkvision.

Mighty Swing.name: Mighty Swing
Mighty Swing.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t move during its turn, it has advantage on the next [[/item Claw]] attack it makes before the start of its next turn.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Attract Bats.name: Attract Bats
Attract Bats.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to below half its hp maximum while underground or outside at night, it releases a high-frequency cry similar to that of an injured bat, attracting other bats to it.

On initiative count 20 of the next round, [[/r 1d6]] @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.qav2dvMIUiMQCCsy]{bats} arrive and aid the skin bat.

These bats aren’t under the skin bat’s control, but they protect it to the best of their abilities, attacking those that harm the skin bat.

Reactive Venom.name: Reactive Venom
Reactive Venom.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals poison damage to a creature that is poisoned, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

Limited Mutability.name: Limited Mutability
Limited Mutability.description: Any spell or effect that would alter the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s form alters it for only 1 round. Afterward, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] returns to its amorphous blob form.

Ethereal Jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
Ethereal Jaunt.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

Ring Magic.name: Ring Magic
Ring Magic.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] draws circles of magic in the air and sends them toward one creature it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it, causing one of the following effects:

MORE

  • Rings of Binding. The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=dnd5eactivity000]] or be &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by magical rings until the end of its next turn.

  • Rings of Bravery. The target can’t be frightened and has advantage on melee weapon attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

  • Rings of Protection. The target has a +2 bonus to its Armor Class until the end of its next turn.

  • Rings of Retribution. When any creature hits the target before the start of the ringmage’s next turn, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=LTtlJby3utmfVmUn]] damage (the ringmage’s choice).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the Rings of Bravery activity.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} by magical rings until the end of its next turn.

Adv. Melee Attacks.name: Adv. Melee Attacks
Adv. Melee Attacks.description: The target can’t be frightened and has advantage on melee weapon attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

+2 AC Bonus.name: +2 AC Bonus
+2 AC Bonus.description: The target has a +2 bonus to its Armor Class until the end of its next turn.

Shifting Flames.name: Shifting Flames
Shifting Flames.description:
The dragon magically transforms into a Gargantuan or smaller fire-based Elemental (such as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.yVNPVJIBpQ2Mp3Xa]{salamander}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.oJCOB9X2BPsBkWW5]{magma mephit}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.8SMQl75HLjhuSeau]{fire elemental}) or back into its true form, which is a Dragon.

Without wings or other way of flying, it loses its flying speed.

Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are the same in each form.

Any equipment it is wearing or carrying transforms with it. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Foundry Note

Several optional Active Effects (AE) are available to enable in the creature's transformed state.

  • One AE removes the fly speed from this sheet if that is important for your encounter.

  • The other AEs will change the creature's size in the sheet since the mechanics of the feature allow you to choose what size you wish to have in the transformed state. But the AE does not change the token size.

  • A @UUID[Compendium.kp-tome-of-beasts-1-2023.tob-1-2023-macros.Macro.m3dDv3QZ6Ilm8NYX]{macro is available} that enables you to change the token size without needing to open the token properties. Select the token, then resize it incrementally up or down by one size or more.

Your gameplay will not be affected substantially if you opt not to use any of the AEs or the macro.

Temp. Loss Flying Speed.name: Temp. Loss Flying Speed
Temp. Loss Flying Speed.description: While transformed, your speed stays the same except it loses you lose your flying speed if the chosen form has no wings/other flight. If you pick a winged form magma mephit, you keep your fly speed.

Firesight.name: Firesight
Firesight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see through areas obscured by fire, smoke, and fog without penalty.

Issue Orders.name: Issue Orders
Issue Orders.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shouts orders at up to two friendly creatures it can see within 30 feet of it.

Each target can do one of the following as a reaction:

MORE

  • Attack. The target makes one weapon attack with advantage.

  • Defend. The target gains a +2 bonus to its Armor Class until the start of the captain’s next turn.

  • Reposition. The target moves up to half its speed without provoking &Reference[opportunity attacks].

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available on the Defend activity to grant the target a bonus to their AC.

+2 AC Bonus.name: +2 AC Bonus
+2 AC Bonus.description: The target gains a +2 bonus to its Armor Class until the start of the captain’s next turn.

Gnawing Bite.name: Gnawing Bite
Gnawing Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target.

While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make [[/item Gnawing Bite]] attacks, and at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, the target takes [[/damage average activity=uUXMJkTTnJD7pWdE]] damage.

The attached [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves with the target whenever the target moves, requiring none of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s movement. It can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement on its turn.

A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]].

affects.special: A creature with the gnarljack attached

Moonlit Weapons.name: Moonlit Weapons
Moonlit Weapons.description: The [[lookup @name]]'s weapon attacks are magical. When he hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 14 (4d6) radiant damage (included in the attack).

Inspiring Shriek.name: Inspiring Shriek
Inspiring Shriek.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shrieks a draconic battle cry.

Each creature that isn’t a dragonborn or kobold within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Each dragonborn and kobold within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=U0N2DVoFYWRVi4PD]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is inspired for 1 minute. Whenever an inspired creature makes an attack roll or saving throw, the creature can roll a [[/r d4]] and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
The target is &Reference[frightened apply=false]{frightened} for 1 minute.

A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Inspired.name: 激励
Inspired.description: Whenever an inspired creature makes an attack roll or saving throw, the creature can roll a [[/r d4]] and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

Deceptive Advice.name: Deceptive Advice
Deceptive Advice.description:
