When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts a spell of the divination school, it has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks for 1 minute.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available on the Effects tab of your character sheet to enable the benefit of this feature.

Adv. Deception Checks.name: Adv. Deception Checks
Adv. Deception Checks.description: The creature has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks for 1 minute.

Acid Breath.name: Acid Breath
Acid Breath.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exhales acidic vapors in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]].

Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Last Laugh.name: Last Laugh
Last Laugh.description:
Unless it is destroyed in a manner amusing to the god of death that created it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in [[/r 1d20]] days, regaining all its hp and becoming active again.

The new body appears in a place of the god’s choosing.

Spit Sweet Water.name: Spit Sweet Water
Spit Sweet Water.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false]{unconscious} for 1 minute.

The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Sew.name: Sew
Sew.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sews the target’s mouth, nose, or one of its eyes closed (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

With supernatural speed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] repeatedly pierces the target’s face, each time threading a loop of the target’s own skin through the previous hole.

These skin loops rapidly blacken, shrink, and draw the orifice tightly closed. If a target’s mouth is sewn shut, it can’t speak.

If its mouth and nose are sewn shut, it can’t breathe, and if both eyes are sewn shut, it is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}

A creature, including the target, can take its action to cut open one of the sewn orifices by succeeding on a [[/check format=long]] with an edged weapon or tool.

check.condition: If the mouth, nose, or eyes are sewn shut

Can't Speak.name: Can't Speak
Can't Speak.description: Because the target's mouth is sewn shut, it can’t speak.

Can't Breath.name: Can't Breath
Can't Breath.description: Because the target's mouth and nose are sewn shut, it can’t breathe.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: Because both the target's eyes are sewn shut, it is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded}.

Tooth-Rattling Pound.name: Tooth-Rattling Pound
Tooth-Rattling Pound.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] rears up and lands heavily, rattling the land and creatures around it.

Each creature in contact with the ground within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, a creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and takes an extra [[/damage average activity=x0BaemKTgEqdCqDK]] damage at the end of its next turn as the shockwaves from the Tooth-Rattling Pound continue up through its body.

On a success, a creature takes half the damage and doesn’t take extra thunder damage from shockwaves.

Enervating Blast.name: Enervating Blast
Enervating Blast.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity checks until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that can be used as a reminder by the target but does not automate the above activity.

Disadv. STR/DEX Checks.name: Disadv. STR/DEX Checks
Disadv. STR/DEX Checks.description: The target has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity checks until the end of its next turn.

Boscage Brachiation.name: Boscage Brachiation
Boscage Brachiation.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] when it climbs out of an enemy’s reach.

Collapsing Star.name: Collapsing Star
Collapsing Star.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it explodes in a swath of celestial destruction.

Each creature within 1,000 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make a [[/save format=long]], taking 55 ([[/r 10d10]]) bludgeoning damage and 55 ([[/r 10d10]]) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried take half the bludgeoning damage.

A creature that fails the saving throw by 5 or more is ejected to a random location on a random plane of existence or [[/r 5d100]] miles away from its current location in a random direction (GM’s choice).

Lightning Absorption.name: 吞雷饮电
Lightning Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hp equal to the lightning damage dealt.

Snake Breath.name: Snake Breath
Snake Breath.description:
The two snake tongues of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] each exhale poison in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type activity=dnd5eactivity000]] that is [[lookup @target.template.width activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet wide, resulting in two lines.

Each creature in a line must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the lines overlap, each creature in the overlapping lines must make one saving throw with disadvantage against only one of the lines rather than one saving throw for each line.

Straddler.name: Straddler
Straddler.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can end its move in the space of a prone Large or smaller creature.

A creature standing up from prone in the same space as the charger can move to a space within 5 feet of the charger as part of standing up.

Esoteric Vengeance.name: Esoteric Vengeance
Esoteric Vengeance.description: When a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it hits it with an attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] intonates a mind-bending arcane secret, and the attacker takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Vulnerability to Water.name: Vulnerability to Water
Vulnerability to Water.description:
For every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1d4 cold damage. An [[lookup @name lowercase]] completely immersed in water takes [[/damage average activity=aA3hIm3HExpj2vWD]] damage at the start of its turn.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured in the Activity's setup for when the creature takes damage from moving through water or being splashed with water. The scale is set to 6, meaning that either the creature's movement is calculated as 5 multiplied by 6 (which equals 30), or it can handle up to 6 gallons of water splashed on it.

Shadow’s Sight.name: Shadow’s Sight
Shadow’s Sight.description: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s darkvision.

Sweet Fragrance.name: Sweet Fragrance
Sweet Fragrance.description:
When a creature that can smell the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s sweet fragrance starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the creature must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} for 1 minute.

While charmed, the creature must move on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the safest available route to get within 5 feet of the plant and drink its water.

If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Sweet Fragrance for the next 24 hours.

Glowing Feathers.name: Glowing Feathers
Glowing Feathers.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can alter the radius as a bonus action.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] willingly gifts a feather to a creature, the feather sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet indefinitely.

Shadow-infused Weapons.name: Shadow-infused Weapons
Shadow-infused Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical.

When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d6 necrotic damage (included in the attack).

Thirsting Dead Nature.name: Thirsting Dead Nature
Thirsting Dead Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t require air, food, or sleep.

Protector’s Step.name: Protector’s Step
Protector’s Step.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space within a structure protected by its [[/item House Guardian]] trait or within 30 feet of the exterior of that structure.

Swirls of golden light, sparkles of starlight, or tendrils of inky shadow (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice) appear at the origin and destination when it uses this bonus action.

Apostasy Aura.name: Apostasy Aura
Apostasy Aura.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s presence causes devout followers to doubt their faith.

When a creature attempts to use divine or celestial power, such as a cleric casting a spell or a paladin using Divine Smite, it must make a [[/save format=long]].

On a failure, the spell, class feature, or other divine or celestial power is expended, but it has no effect.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled} (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained} and takes [[/damage average activity=sDTgrvGBQCLUXCYM]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the glass gator can’t use Constrict on another target.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: The target is &Reference[grappled apply=false]{grappled}. Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}.

Hidden Original.name: Hidden Original
Hidden Original.description:
While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in the space of a swarm it created with [[/item Arcane Doubling]], it is indiscernible from the other rats and has total cover.

A creature must take an action to visually inspect the swarm and succeed on a [[/check format=long]] to find the [[lookup @name lowercase]] among its duplicates.

Once a creature succeeds on this check, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] loses &Reference[total cover] against attacks and spells from that creature and that creature’s allies until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn in the same space as one of its swarms.

Hooked Wire.name: Hooked Wire
Hooked Wire.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls itself in a straight line up to 25 feet toward the target, stopping in the nearest unoccupied space to the target.

When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in this way, &Reference[opportunity attacks] against it have disadvantage.

Ash Cloud.name: Ash Cloud
Ash Cloud.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings, filling the area within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dnd5eactivity000]] feet of it with ash for 1 minute.

The ash spreads around corners, and its area is &Reference[heavily obscured].

Each creature that isn’t an [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that enters the cloud for the first time on its turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.

The ash moves with the [[lookup @name lowercase]], remaining centered on it for the duration.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} until the end of its next turn.
